src: Začněme vysvětlením o plánech Itálie, která byla především „menším sourozencem“ Německa a Japonska. Měli slabší armádu i námořnictvo, a to i přesto, že krátce před začátkem války postavili čtyři nové lodě. Hlavními cíli Itálie byly africké země. Pro obsazení těchto zemí potřebovali výsadkovou plošinu pro vojáky, aby se vojsko mohlo dopravovat přes Středozemní moře a podnikat invaze do Afriky. Z tohoto důvodu se museli zbavit britských základen a lodí v Egyptě. Kromě těchto akcí neměly italské válečné lodě žádné jiné úkoly. Nyní přejděme k Japonsku, které bylo stejně jako Británie ostrovním státem.
mt: Let's start by explaining the plans of Italy, which was primarily "the younger brother" of Germany and Japan. They had a weaker army and navy, and this despite the fact that shortly before the start of the war they built four new ships. The main targets of Italy were African countries. To occupy these countries they needed an amphibious platform for soldiers, so that the army could be transported across the Mediterranean Sea and undertake invasions into Africa. In addition to these actions, Italian warships had no other tasks. Now let's move on to Japan, which was like Britain an island state.
ref: "Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the ""little brother"" of Germany and Japan. It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war. Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa. For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else. Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain."

src: Vylodění v Normandii a následné bitvy přinesly osvobození severní Francie, ale jih země ještě osvobozen nebyl. Vládli mu francouzští „Vichy“. To byli Francouzi, kteří v roce 1940 uzavřeli mír s Němci a s invazními silami namísto boje spolupracovali. Dne 15. srpna 1940 podnikli spojenci invazi do jižní Francie. Invaze byla nazývána Operace Dragoon. Za pouhé dva týdny Američané a Svobodné francouzské síly osvobodili jižní Francii a obrátili se k Německu.
mt: 15 August 1940, Operation Dragoon, the invasion of southern France, was launched. The invasion was a success and the southern part of France was liberated in just two weeks.
ref: "The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free. It was ruled by the ""Vichy"" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."

Invaze byla nazývána Operace Dragoon. Za pouhé dva týdny Američané a Svobodné francouzské síly osvobodili jižní Francii a obrátili se k Německu.
mt: 15 August 1940, Operation Dragoon, the invasion of southern France, was launched. The invasion was a success and the southern part of France was liberated in just two weeks.
ref: "The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free. It was ruled by the ""Vichy"" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."

src: Ponorky jsou lodě navržené pro cestování pod vodou, kde zůstávají po dlouhou dobu. Ponorky byly použity v první a druhé světové válce. Tehdy byly velmi pomalé a měly velmi omezený dostřel. Na počátku války se obvykle přesouvaly po hladině, ale když se radar vlivem svého vývoje stával čím dál přesnějším, byly ponorky nuceny přejít pod vodu, aby nebyly spatřeny. Německé ponorky se nazývaly U-Boot. Němci byli v navigaci a řízení svých ponorek velice zdatní. Vzhledem k úspěšnosti Němců ohledně ponorek jim není důvěřováno natolik, aby jich mohli vlastnit velké množství.
mt: Submarines are ships designed for travel under water, where they remain for a long time. Submarines were used in the first and second world wars. At the beginning of the war they were very slow and had a very limited range. At the beginning of the war they were usually moved across the surface, but when the radar became more and more precise, submarines were forced to go under water, so they could not be seen. German submarines were called U-Boat. Germans were very skilled in navigation and control of their submarines. Due to the success of the Germans regarding submarines, they are not trusted enough to be able to own a large number of them.
ref: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.

src: 17. září 1939 byla polská obrana již prolomena, a jedinou naději představoval ústup a přeskupení sil podél Rumunského předmostí. Tyto plány však téměř přes noc vzaly za své, když více než 800 000 vojáků sovětské Rudé armády vytvořilo běloruské a ukrajinské fronty poté, co vojáci napadli východní oblasti Polska a porušili tím Rižskou mírovou smlouvou, Sovětsko-polský pakt o neútočení a další mezinárodní smlouvy, a to jak dvoustranné, tak i mnohostranné.
mt: 17 September 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was a retreat and reorganization of forces along the Romanian bridgehead. These plans, however, almost overnight took a turn for the worse, when more than 800,000 soldiers of the Soviet Red Army created the Belorussian and Ukrainian fronts after troops attacked eastern areas of Poland and violated the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact and other international agreements, both bilateral and multilateral.
ref: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

src: V severní Africe se Italům nedařilo téměř od začátku. Během jednoho týdne od vyhlášení války Itálií dne 10. června 1940 se britskému 11. husarskému regimentu podařilo zabrat pevnost Fort Capuzzo v Libyi. Při přepadu východní části Bardie zajali Britové velitele ženijního sboru desáté armády, generála Lastucciho. 28. června byl maršál Italo Balbo, guvernér-generál Libye a zjevný následovník Mussoliniho, zabit spojeneckou palbou při přistání v Tobruku.
mt: In North Africa, the Italians had trouble almost from the start. During one week from the declaration of war by Italy on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars cavalry regiment managed to capture the fortress Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In a raid on the eastern part of Bardia, the British captured the commander of the engineer corps of the tenth army, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, governor-general of Libya and an obvious successor to Mussolini, was killed by allied fire while landing in Tobruk.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: Tibetský buddhismus je založen na Buddhově učení, ale byl rozšířen o mahayanskou cestu lásky a o mnoho technik z indické jógy. Zásady tibetského buddhismu jsou v zásadě velmi jednoduché. Jsou to kundaliní jóga, meditace a cesta všeobjímající lásky. Při józe Kundalini je energie Kundalini (energie osvícení) probuzena polohami této jógy, dýchacími cvičeními, mantrami a vizualizacemi. Středobodem tibetské meditace je Deity Yoga. Prostřednictvím vizualizace různých božstev jsou vyčištěny energetické kanály, aktivovány čakry a vytvořeno osvícené vědomí.
mt: Tibetan Buddhism is based on the Buddha's teaching, but was expanded by the Mahayana path of love and many techniques from Indian yoga. The principles of Tibetan Buddhism are basically very simple. They are Kundalini yoga, meditation and the path of all-encompassing love. In Kundalini yoga, the Kundalini energy (energy of enlightenment) is awakened by the postures of this yoga, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The focus of Tibetan meditation is Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities, the energy channels are cleansed, the chakras are activated and enlightened consciousness is created.
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

src: Program byl zahájen ve 20:30 místního času (15:00 UTC). Slavní zpěváci z celé země předložili k nohám Šrí Shyamovi bhadžany neboli písně oddanosti. Večer zahájil zpěvák Sanju Sharma a po něm následoval Jai Shankar Choudhary. Lakkha Singh zazpíval také chhappan bhog bhajan. Doprovázel jej zpěvák Raju Khandelwal. Poté zpěv bhajanů převzal Lakkha Singh. Baba Shyam obdržel 108 talířů Chhappan Bhog (v hinduismu 56 různých typů jídla jako sladkosti, ovoce, oříšky, pokrmy atd. nabízené božstvu). Poté Lakkha Singh představil také chhappan bhog bhajan. Doprovázel ho zpěvák Raju Khandelwal.
mt: 20:30 local time (15:00 UTC) the program began. Famous singers from all over the country presented their feet to Sri Shyam bhadžany or songs of devotion. The evening was opened by singer Sanju Sharma and then followed Jai Shankar Choudhary. Lakkha Singh also sang chhappan bhog bhajan. He was accompanied by singer Raju Khandelwal. Then the singing of bhajans took over Lakkha Singh. Baba Shyam received 108 bowls Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism 56 different types of food such as sweets, fruit, nuts, dishes etc. offered to the deity). Then Lakkha Singh also presented chhappan bhog bhajan. He was accompanied by singer Raju Khandelwal.
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: "Oslavy byly zahájeny speciálním představením světoznámého souboru Cirque du Soleil. Následoval Istanbulský symfonický orchestr, skupina Janičářů či zpěváci Fatih Erkoç a Müslüm Gürses. Poté na pódium přišli Vířící dervišové. Turecká diva Sezen Aksu vystoupila s italským tenorem Alessandrem Safinou a řeckým zpěvákem Harisem Alexiouem. ""Na závěr turecká taneční skupina Oheň Anatolie předvedla vystoupení """"Trója"""". """
mt: "The celebrations were kicked off by a special performance by the world-famous Cirque du Soleil. The Istanbul Symphony Orchestra, the Janissary Band, singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses followed. Then the Whirling Dervishes came on stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. "At the end, the Anatolian Fire dance group performed the "Trojan Horse" show. "
ref: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."

src: "Pasažéři dostali vodu, protože čekali ve 30° horku. Kapitán požárníků Scott Kouns řekl: „Byl to tehdy v Santa Claře horký den s teplotami přes 30 stupňů. ""Uvíznout na horské dráze po jakkoliv dlouhou dobu musí být přinejmenším nepříjemné, přičemž zabralo nejméně hodinu dostat z atrakce prvního člověka."""""""
mt: "Passengers were given water because they were waiting in 30 degree heat. Captain of the fire department Scott Kouns said: "It was a hot day in Santa Clara with temperatures over 30 degrees. ""Getting stuck on a mountain runway for any length of time must be at least uncomfortable, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the attraction."""""""
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: Podle posledního bulletinu naznačovalo sledování mořské hladiny vznik tsunami. Jednoznačná aktivita tsunami byla zaznamenána poblíž Pago Pago a Niue. V Tonze nebyly hlášeny žádné velké škody ani zranění, ale došlo k dočasnému výpadku energie, což údajně zabránilo tonžským orgánům, aby přijaly varování před tsunami vydané PTWC. Čtrnáct škol na Havaji nacházejících se na pobřeží nebo v jeho blízkosti bylo celou středu zavřeno i přesto, že varování byla odvolána.
mt: According to the latest bulletin, the tsunami watch was issued due to the possibility of a tsunami.  A definite tsunami was observed near Pago Pago and Niue.  In Tonga, no major damage or injuries were reported, but a temporary power outage prevented Tongan officials from receiving a tsunami warning issued by PTWC.  Fourteen schools on Hawaii located on the coast or near the coast were closed all day Wednesday, even though the warning was cancelled.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Jonny Reid, spoluřidič novozélandského týmu A1GP, se dnes zapsal do historie nejrychlejším legálním přejezdem 48 let starého mostu Auckland Harbour Bridge. Pan Reid dokázal přejet přes most sedmkrát novozélandským vozem pro A1GP Black Beauty, a to rychlostí přes 160 km/h. Novozélandská policie měla potíže použít na změření rychlosti pana Reida rychlostní radarové pistole kvůli tomu, jak je Black Beauty nízká. Jeho rychlost se podařilo změřit pouze v případě, kdy zpomalil na 160km/h.
mt: Jonny Reid, co-driver of the New Zealand A1GP team, today entered the record books as the fastest legal crossing of the 48 year old Auckland Harbour Bridge. Mr Reid managed to cross the bridge seven times in the New Zealand A1GP car Black Beauty, at a speed of over 160 km/h. The New Zealand police had trouble using a radar gun to measure Mr Reid's speed due to the low height of Black Beauty. His speed was only measured when he slowed to 160 km/h.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: Jonny Reid, spoluřidič novozélandského týmu A1GP, se dnes zapsal do historie nejrychlejším legálním přejezdem 48 let starého mostu Auckland Harbour Bridge. Pan Reid dokázal přejet přes most sedmkrát novozélandským vozem pro A1GP Black Beauty, a to rychlostí přes 160 km/h. Novozélandská policie měla potíže použít na změření rychlosti pana Reida rychlostní radarové pistole kvůli tomu, jak je Black Beauty nízká. Jeho rychlost se podařilo změřit pouze v případě, kdy zpomalil na 160km/h.

src: V pondělí ve 22:08 otřáslo západní Montanou  střední zemětřesení. United States Geological Survey (USGS) a jeho National Earthquake Information Center neobdržely žádné bezprostřední zprávy o škodách. Epicentrum zemětřesení bylo asi 20 km (15 mil) severo-severovýchodně od Dillonu a asi 65 km (40 mil) jižně od Butte.
mt: On Monday at 22:08, Western Montana was shaken by a moderate earthquake. The United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center received no immediate reports of damage. The epicenter of the earthquake was about 20 km (15 mi) north-northeast of Dillon and about 65 km (40 mi) south of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: Irácké vězení Abú Ghraíb bylo zapáleno během protestů. Vězení se stalo nechvalně známým poté, co zde byly objeveny případy zneužívání vězňů po převzetí moci americkými silami.
mt: The Abu Ghraib prison was set ablaze during protests. The prison became infamous after reports of prisoner abuse were found after the U.S. takeover of power.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

mt: The Abu Ghraib prison was set ablaze during protests. The prison became infamous after reports of prisoner abuse were found after the U.S. takeover of power.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: Hudební skupina zrušila vystoupení na stadionu War Memorial Stadium na ostrově Maui, které mělo mít návštěvnost 9 000 diváků, a svým fanouškům se omluvila. Firma HK Management Inc. zodpovědná za management kapely původně ke zrušení dne 20. září neuvedla žádný důvod, ale další den svalila vinu na logistické příčiny.
mt: The band canceled a performance at the War Memorial Stadium on the island of Maui, which was expected to have a crowd of 9,000, and apologized to its fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., originally did not give a reason for the cancellation on September 20, but the next day blamed logistical reasons.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: Rozsáhlé rabování údajně pokračovalo přes noc, jelikož policisté nebyli v ulicích Biškeku přítomni. Biškek byl jedním pozorovatelem popsán tak, že se propadá do stavu „anarchie“. Po ulicích se potulovaly gangy lidí a drancovaly obchody se spotřebním zbožím. Několik obyvatel Biškeku obvinilo protestující z jihu z nezákonného jednání.
mt: Extensive looting was reportedly continuing overnight, as police were not present in the streets of Bishkek. Bishkek was described by one observer as "slipping into a state of anarchy". Gangs of people were roaming the streets and looting shops selling consumer goods. Several residents of Bishkek accused protesters from the south of illegal behaviour.
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: Jamie Siminoff, výkonný ředitel Ring, dříve uvedl, že jeho firma byla založena poté, co v dílně ve své garáži neslyšel zvuk dveřního zvonku. Uvedl, že vytvořil dveřní zvonek přes WiFi. Siminoff uvedl, že prodej vzrostl po jeho vystoupení v epizodě Shark Tank v roce 2013, kde vedení pořadu odmítlo financování startupu. Na konci roku 2017 se Siminoff objevil na teleshoppingovém kanálu QVC. Ring také vyřešil soudní spor s konkurenční bezpečnostní firmou ADT Corporation.
mt: Jamie Siminoff, Ring's CEO, previously said his company was founded after he didn't hear the doorbell chime in his garage workshop. He said he created a doorbell over Wi-Fi. Siminoff said sales increased after his appearance on the reality show Shark Tank in 2013, where the show's leadership rejected funding for the startup. At the end of 2017, Siminoff appeared on the shopping channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with security company ADT Corporation.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Tento seriál PBS získal přes dva tucty ocenění Emmy a déle se vysílaly už jen Sezame, otevři se a Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Každá epizoda pořadu se soustředí na téma konkrétní knihy a potom toto téma zkoumá skrze několik příběhů. V každém dílu bylo také poskytnuto doporučení na knihy, které děti měly vyhledat, když šly do knihovny. John Grant z WNED Buffalo (domovská stanice Reading Rainbow) řekl: „Reading Rainbow naučilo děti, proč mají číst... lásce ke čtení — [tento pořad] povzbudil děti, aby si vzaly knížku a četly.“ Někteří včetně Johna Granta věří, že k ukončení série přispěla jak krize financování, tak i posun ve filozofii programování vzdělávací televize.
mt: This PBS series won over two hundred Emmy awards and was only surpassed in length by Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show focused on a particular book and then explored that topic through several stories. In each episode, a book recommendation was also given for children to look for when they went to the library. John Grant of WNED Buffalo (the home station of Reading Rainbow) said, "Reading Rainbow taught children why they should read... the love of reading — [this show] encouraged children to take a book and read." Some, including John Grant, believe that the series was ended due to both a funding crisis and a shift in philosophy of educational television programming.
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: Zástupci města Amsterdamu a muzea Anny Frankové tvrdí, že strom je napaden houbou a přestavuje riziko pro veřejné zdraví, protože by podle nich mohl kdykoliv spadnout. Kácení bylo naplánováno na úterý, ale tomu zabránilo mimořádné rozhodnutí soudu.
mt: Representatives of the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank House say the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a risk to public health, as it could fall at any time. The tree was scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but this was prevented by an extraordinary court decision.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: Královská společnost pro svobodu zvířat a prevenci krutosti na zvířatech (RSPCA) opět volá po povinné instalaci průmyslových kamer na všech australských jatkách. Hlavní inspektor organizace RSPCA pro Nový Jižní Wales David O'Shannessy televizi ABC sdělil, že dohled nad jatky a jejich kontroly by měly být v Austrálii samozřejmostí. „Kamerový systém by jistě lidem pracujícím se zvířaty vyslal důrazný signál o tom, že jejich zdraví má nejvyšší prioritu.“
mt: The Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) is again calling for mandatory installation of industrial cameras on all Australian abattoirs. The organisation's chief inspector in New South Wales, David O'Shannessy, told ABC television that oversight of abattoirs and their inspections should be a given in Australia. "A camera system would certainly send a strong signal to those working with animals that their health is the top priority."
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: Zatímco se dnes v komunitě Red Lake konaly pohřby Jeffa Weise a tří z devíti obětí, rozšířily se zprávy, že byl zadržen další student ve spojitosti se střelbou na škole z 21. března. Kromě dnešního zatčení sdělily úřady oficiálně jen málo. Zdroj informací týkajících se vyšetřování však pro Minneapolis Star-Tribune uvedl, že šlo o Louise Jourdaina, šestnáctiletého syna kmenového předsedy Red Lake Floyda Jourdaina. V tuto chvíli není známo, jaké obvinění bude vzneseno, ani co úřady k chlapci dovedlo, ale u federálního soudu již bylo zahájeno řízení pro mladistvé.
mt: While today in the Red Lake community funerals were held for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims, reports spread that another student was arrested in connection with the shooting at the school on March 21. Besides today's arrest, authorities officially announced little. A source of information regarding the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was about Louis Jourdain, the sixteen-year-old son of Red Lake tribal chairman Floyd Jourdain. At this time it is not known what charges will be filed, or what authorities had against the boy, but proceedings for juveniles have already begun in federal court.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: Organizátoři protestů prohlásili, že se jich v německých městech jako Berlín, Kolín, Hamburg a Hanover účastnilo zhruba 100 000 lidí. V Berlíně policie odhadovala 6 500 protestujících. Protesty se konaly také v Paříži, v Sofii v Bulharsku, ve Vilniusu v Litvě, ve Valettě na Maltě, v Tallinnu v Estonsku a v Edinburghu a v Glasgow ve Skotsku. V Londýně protestovalo asi 200 lidí před některými kancelářemi držitelů autorských práv. Minulý měsíc se v Polsku, které podepsalo dohodu ACTA, odehrály velké protesty, jež vedly k tomu, že polská vláda odmítla prozatím dohodu ratifikovat. Jak Lotyšsko, tak Slovensko zdržovaly proces přistoupení k ACTA.
mt: 100,000 people in Germany, including Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg and Hanover, took part in protests, according to organizers. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protesters. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valletta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some of the copyright holders' offices. Last month, large protests in Poland, which signed the ACTA, led to the Polish government's decision to delay ratification. Latvia and Slovakia have also delayed the accession process to ACTA.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: Bylo nahlášeno přibližně 60 případů přehřátí vadných iPodů, což způsobilo celkem šest požárů a čtyři osoby to odnesly lehkými popáleninami. Japonské ministerstvo hospodářství, obchodu a průmyslu (METI –⁠ Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry) uvedlo, že si bylo vědomo 27 nehod souvisejících se zařízeními. Minulý týden METI oznámil, že jej Apple informoval o 34 dalších incidentech přehřívání, které společnost označila jako „nijak vážné“. Ministerstvo reagovalo tím, že odložení zprávy Applem označilo za „opravdu politováníhodné“.
mt: 60 cases of overheating faulty iPods were reported, causing six fires and four people suffered minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) reported 27 incidents involving the devices. Last week METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which Apple had labeled as "not serious". The ministry responded by calling Apple's delay in reporting the incidents "very regrettable".
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: Bylo nahlášeno přibližně 60 případů přehřátí vadných iPodů, což způsobilo celkem šest požárů a čtyři osoby to odnesly lehkými popáleninami. Japonské ministerstvo hospodářství, obchodu a průmyslu (METI –⁠ Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry) uvedlo, že si bylo vědomo 27 nehod souvisejících se zařízeními. Minulý týden METI oznámil, že jej Apple informoval o 34 dalších incidentech přehřívání, které společnost označila jako „nijak vážné“. Ministerstvo reagovalo tím, že odložení zprávy Applem označilo za „opravdu politováníhodné“.
mt: 60 cases of overheating faulty iPods were reported, causing six fires and four people suffered minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) reported 27 incidents involving the devices. Last week METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which Apple had labeled as "not serious". The ministry responded by calling Apple's delay in reporting the incidents "very regrettable".

Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: Výkonný ředitel společnosti Apple, Steve Jobs, představil zařízení tak, že šel na pódium a vytáhl iPhone z kapsy svých džín. Během své dvouhodinové řeči prohlásil, že „Apple dnes znovu vynalezne telefon, dnes se zapíšeme do historie“.
mt: Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking on stage and pulling an iPhone from the pocket of his jeans. During his two-hour speech, he declared, "Apple reinvents the phone today, we will write ourselves into the history books."
ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

src: Současná senátorka a první dáma Argentiny Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner oznámila svou prezidentskou kandidaturu včera večer v La Plata, městě vzdáleném 50 kilometrů (31 mil) od Buenos Aires. Paní Kirchner oznámila svůj záměr ucházet se o prezidentský úřad v Divadle Argentina, tedy na stejném místě, kde v roce 2005 zahájila svou kampaň do Senátu jakožto členka delegace z provincie Buenos Aires.
mt: Current Argentine senator and first lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy last night in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for the presidency at the Teatro Argentina, the same place where in 2005 she began her campaign for the Senate as a member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: ACMA také zjistil, že navzdory streamování videa na internetu Big Brother neporušil zákony o cenzuře obsahu online, protože média nebyla uložena na webových stránkách Big Brother. Mediální zákon Broadcasting Services Act reguluje internetový obsah, avšak za internetový se považuje takový obsah, který je fyzicky přítomen na serveru.
mt: ACMA also found that despite streaming video online, Big Brother did not breach online censorship laws because the media was not stored on Big Brother's web site. The Broadcasting Services Act regulates online media, but for online media to be considered as such, it must be physically present on a server.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: Australský ministr financí Peter Costello, který je nejpravděpodobnějším kandidátem k nahrazení předsedy vlády Johna Howarda na postu vůdce liberální strany, podpořil australskou jadernou energetiku. Costello prohlásil, že jakmile se výroba jaderné energie stane ekonomicky životaschopnou, Austrálie by měla pokračovat v jejím využívání. „Pokud se stane komerčním produktem, měli bychom ji mít. Znamená to, že nemáme vůči jaderné energii principiální námitky,“ řekl Costello.
mt: Australian Finance Minister Peter Costello, who is the most likely candidate to replace Prime Minister John Howard as leader of the Liberal Party, supported Australian nuclear energy. Costello said that once nuclear energy becomes economically viable, Australia should continue to use it. "If it becomes a commercial product, we should have it. It means we don't have principled objections to nuclear energy," said Costello.
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: Jelikož bylo k dispozici pouze osmnáct medailí denně, některým zemím se nepodařilo dostat se na stupně vítězů. Zahrnují Nizozemsko, jelikož Anna Jochemsen včera skončila devátá v kategorii žen, a také Finsko s Katjou Saarinen, která stejný závod dokončila desátá. Australský Mitchell Gourley skončil jedenáctý v závodě pánské super-G ve stoje. Český závodník Oldřich Jelínek skončil šestnáctý v závodě pánské super-G v sedě. Arly Velásquez z Mexika skončil patnáctý v závodě pánské super-G v sedě. Novozélandský Adam Hall skončil devátý v závodě pánské super-G ve stoje. Zrakově postižený lyžař Maciej Krezel a vodička Anna Ogarzynska z Polska skočili v super-G na 13. místě. Jong Seork Park z Jižní Koreji skončil v mužském super-G vsedě na 24. místě.
mt: Because there were only eighteen medals available per day, some countries did not make the podium. These include the Netherlands, as Anna Jochemsen finished ninth in the women's event yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen, who finished tenth in the same event. Australian Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's super-G standing event. Czech skier Oldřich Jelínek finished sixteenth in the men's super-G sitting event. Arly Velásquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's super-G sitting event. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's super-G standing event. Visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska of Poland finished thirteenth in the super-G. Jong Seork Park of South Korea finished twenty-fourth in the men's super-G sitting event.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: Soud se odehrál na Královském dvoře v Birminghamu a skončil 3. srpna. Přednášející, jež byl na místě zatčen, útok popíral a říkal, že tyč použil k vlastní obraně před láhvemi, které na něj házelo až třicet lidí. Blake byl také usvědčen z pokusu o zvrácení soudního řízení. Soud řekl Blakeovi, že je „téměř nevyhnutelné“, aby byl poslán do vězení.
mt: The trial took place at the Royal Courts of Justice in Birmingham and ended on 3 August. The speaker, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and said he used the stick to defend himself against bottles thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The court told Blake that it was "almost inevitable" that he would be sent to prison.
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: Další témata programu na Bali zahrnují záchranu zbývajících světových lesů a sdílení technologií s cílem pomoci růst rozvojovým národům méně znečišťujícími způsoby. OSN také doufá v dokončení fondu na pomoc zemím ohroženým globálním oteplováním pro zvládání jeho dopadů. Peníze se mohou využít na protipovodňové zabezpečení domů, lepší hospodaření s vodou a diverzifikaci plodin.
mt: Other issues on the Bali agenda include saving the world's remaining forests and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow less polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to complete a fund to help climate-vulnerable nations cope with its impacts. The money could be used for flood-proofing homes, better water management and crop diversification.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: Nigérie dříve oznámila, že se plánuje připojit k AfCFTA v týdnu před summitem. Komisař Africké unie pro obchod a průmysl Albert Muchanga oznámil připojení Beninu. Člen komise uvedl: „Dosud jsme se nedohodli na pravidlech původu a celních koncesích, ale rámec, který máme, je dostatečný pro zahájení obchodování k 1. červenci 2020.“
mt: Nigeria previously announced it was planning to join the AfCFTA in the week before the summit. African Union Commissioner for Trade and Industry Albert Muchanga announced the accession of Benin. A member of the commission said: "We have not yet agreed on rules of origin and customs concessions, but the framework we have is sufficient to start trading from July 1, 2020."
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

A member of the commission said: "We have not yet agreed on rules of origin and customs concessions, but the framework we have is sufficient to start trading from July 1, 2020."
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: Během svého působení v Atlantě byla kriticky uznávaná a také oceňovaná za inovativní městské vzdělávání. V roce 2009 získala titul Celostátní komisař roku. V době udělení ceny došlo k výraznému zlepšení skóre v testech na školách v Atlantě. Krátce nato vydala Atlantská novinářská ústava zprávu o problémech s výsledky testů. Zpráva ukázala, že výsledky testů stouply nepravděpodobně rychle a škola prý problémy interně zaznamenala, ale na základě nálezů nejednala. Důkazy poté ukázaly, že testovací formuláře byly upraveny, a Hallová byla v roce 2013 obžalována spolu s dalšími pracovníky působícími v oblasti vzdělávání.
mt: During her tenure in Atlanta, she was both highly praised and also criticized for innovative urban education. In 2009, she was named Georgia's Superintendent of the Year. Shortly after receiving the award, the Atlanta Journal-Constitution reported on problems with test scores. The report showed that test scores had risen improbably quickly and that the school had internally identified problems, but had not acted on them. Subsequent evidence showed that test forms had been altered, and Hall was indicted in 2013 along with other education officials.
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: Před kanceláří guvernéra vybuchla jedna bomba. Tři další bomby vybuchly poblíž vládních budov v rozmezí dvou hodin. Některé zprávy uvádí oficiálně 8 mrtvých a oficiální zprávy potvrzují až 30 zraněných; konečný počet však zatím známý není.
mt: 1 bomb exploded outside the governor's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings within a two hour period. Some reports indicate 8 dead and official reports confirm up to 30 injured; the final number is still unknown.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: 21letý Jesus nastoupil do Manchester City minulý rok v lednu (2017). Přešel z Brazilského klubu Palmeiras za cenu 27 mil. GBP. Od té doby se tento Brazilec zúčastnil 53 zápasů klubu ve všech soutěžích a vstřelil 24 gólů.
mt: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January (2017). He moved from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a fee of £27 million. Since then, this Brazilian has participated in 53 club matches in all competitions and scored 24 goals.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: 21letý Jesus nastoupil do Manchester City minulý rok v lednu (2017). Přešel z Brazilského klubu Palmeiras za cenu 27 mil. GBP. Od té doby se tento Brazilec zúčastnil 53 zápasů klubu ve všech soutěžích a vstřelil 24 gólů.
mt: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January (2017). He moved from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a fee of £27 million. Since then, this Brazilian has participated in 53 club matches in all competitions and scored 24 goals.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: Dnes ráno asi v 10 hodin místního času spadl v Mekce, svatém městě islámu, hostel. V budově se nacházelo množství poutníků, kteří přijeli navštívit svaté město v předvečer pouti zvané hadždž. Návštěvníci hostelu byli povětšinou občané ze Spojených arabských emirátů. Počet obětí činí nejméně 15 a očekává se, že toto číslo bude vzrůstat.
mt: This morning at around 10 am local time a hostel in Mecca, the holy city of Islam, collapsed. The building housed a large number of pilgrims who had come to visit the holy city in advance of the pilgrimage called Hajj. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll stands at least 15 and is expected to rise.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: Satelity, které vážily přes 450 kg a cestovaly rychlostí přibližně 27 300 kilometrů za hodinu, se srazily 790 km nad Zemí. Vědci uvádějí, že exploze způsobená nárazem byla masivní. Stále se pokoušejí určit, jak velký byl náraz a jaký bude mít vliv na Zemi. Trosky sleduje oddělení United States Strategic Command Ministerstva obrany Spojených států amerických. Výsledek vykreslovací analýzy bude zveřejněn na veřejně přístupném webu.
mt: The satellites, which weighed more than 450 kilograms and were traveling at about 27,300 kilometers per hour, collided 790 kilometers above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine how big the collision was and what effect it will have on the Earth. The debris is being tracked by the United States Strategic Command Department of Defense of the United States. The result of the impact analysis will be published on a publicly accessible website.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: Batten se v roce 2008 zařadil na 190. místo na seznamu 400 nejbohatších Američanů, přičemž hodnota jeho majetku byla odhadnuta na 2,3 miliardy amerických dolarů. Vystudoval Fakultu umění a věd na univerzitě ve Virginii roku 1950 a stal se významným dárcem této instituce.
mt: Batten was ranked 190th on the Forbes 400 list of the richest Americans in 2008, with an estimated net worth of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the University of Virginia's College of Arts and Sciences in 1950 and was a major donor to the institution.
ref: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.

src: Guvernér Kalifornie Arnold Schwarzenegger podepsal zákon zakazující prodej nebo půjčování násilných videoher nezletilým. Tento zákon požaduje, aby byly násilné videohry prodávané ve státě Kalifornie označeny samolepkou s číslem „18“ a aby se jejich prodej mladistvým trestal pokutou 1 000 dolarů za každý přestupek.
mt: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed a bill banning the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. This law requires violent video games sold in California to be labeled with an "18" sticker and their sale to minors to be fined $1,000 per offense.
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: Duvall, který je ženatý a má dvě dospělé děti, neudělal velký dojem na Millera, kterého se příběh týkal. Při dotazu na komentář Miller řekl: „Mike při slyšení mluví hodně... Připravoval jsem se, a tak jsem úplně neslyšel, co říkal.“
mt: Duvall, who is married and has two adult children, did not make much of an impression on Miller, who the story was about. Asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike was talking a lot... I was preparing, so I didn't hear everything he said."
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: """Předseda vlády Stephen Harper souhlasil, že vládní """"Vyhlášku o čistém vzduchu"""" předloží ke kontrole výboru všech stran před jejím druhým čtením, a to po úterním 25minutovém setkání s lídrem NDP Jackem Laytonem v projektové kanceláři. "" Layton požádal při setkání s ministerským předsedou o změny konzervativci navrženého zákona o ochraně životního prostředí, konkrétně požadoval „naprosté a kompletní přepracování“ zákona o ochraně životního prostředí z dílny Konzervativní strany. Od doby, kdy federální vláda převzala financování nemocnice Mersey v Devonportu v Tasmánii, vláda státu a někteří federální poslanci kritizovali tento čin jako pouhé gesto předcházející federálním volbám, které měly být vyhlášeny v listopadu. Premiér John Howard ale uvedl, že cílem byla pouze ochrana zařízení nemocnice před snížením úrovně tasmánskou vládou, a to poskytnutím dalších 45 milionů AUD."
mt: """Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to have the government's "Clean Air Act" referred to a committee of all parties before its second reading, after a 25-minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton in his project office. "" Layton asked for changes to the Conservative Party's proposed environmental protection law, specifically asking for a "complete and comprehensive reworking" of the environmental protection law. Since the federal government took over funding for the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs criticized the move as a mere gesture preceding federal elections, which were to be held in November. Prime Minister John Howard said the aim was only to protect the hospital from a reduction in the level of the Tasmanian government, by providing an additional $45 million AUD."""
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: Ve vzorcích moči domácích zvířat, která zemřela po konzumaci kontaminovaného krmiva, byla nalezena kyselina kyanurová i melamin. Výzkumníci z univerzity uvedli, že tyto dvě sloučeniny na sebe vzájemně reagují a formují krystaly, které mohou blokovat funkci ledvin. Vědci pozorovali krystaly vzniklé v moči koček přidáním melaminu a kyseliny kyanurové. Kompozice těchto krystalů po porovnání za pomoci infračervené spektroskopie (FTIR) odpovídá těm, které byly nalezeny v moči postižených domácích zvířat.
mt: In urine samples of domestic animals that died after consuming contaminated feed, cyanuric acid and melamine were found. Researchers from the university said that these two compounds react with each other and form crystals that can block kidney function. Scientists observed crystals formed in cat urine by adding melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals, after comparison using infrared spectroscopy (FTIR), matches those found in the urine of affected domestic animals.
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: Agentura Sin-chua uvedla, že vládní vyšetřovatelé ve středu objevili dvě „černé skříňky“ se záznamy o průběhu letu. Kolegové wrestleři také vzdali Luně hold. Tommy Dreamer řekl: „Luna byla první Královnou extrémů. Moje první manažerka. Luna zemřela během noci, kdy byly na obloze dva Měsíce. Jedinečné, stejně jako ona sama. Byla to silná žena. Dustin „Goldust“ Runnels uvedl, že „Luna byla bláznivá jako já... možná ještě víc... měl jsem ji rád a bude mi chybět... snad je někde, kde je lépe.“
mt: The Xinhua agency reported that government investigators found two "black boxes" with recordings of the flight's progress on Wednesday. Wrestling colleagues also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said, "Luna was the first Queen of Extremes. My first manager. Luna died during the night when there were two Moons in the sky. Unique, just like herself. She was a strong woman. Dustin "Goldust" Runnels said, "Luna was crazy like me... maybe even more... I loved her and I will miss her... maybe she's somewhere better..."
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""

src: Ačkoliv se v momentě nárazu auta v domě nacházeli tři lidé, ani jeden z nich nebyl zraněn. Řidič však utrpěl vážné poranění hlavy. Silnice, kde se kolize stala, byla dočasně uzavřena, zatímco záchranné služby vyprošťovaly řidiče z červené Audi TT. Zpočátku byl hospitalizován v Nemocnici Jamese Pageta v Great Yarmouth. Poté byl přesunut do Addenbrookovy nemocnice v Cambridge.
mt: Although no one was injured in the house at the time of the crash, none of the three people were injured. The driver, however, suffered serious head injuries. The road where the collision occurred was temporarily closed while rescue services extricated the driver from the red Audi TT. Initially, he was hospitalized at the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was then transferred to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
ref: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

src: Zápas byl zahájen v 10:00 za skvělého počasí a s výjimkou dopolední přeháňky, která se rychle rozehnala, se jednalo o skvělý den pro sedmičkové rugby. První nasazený tým Jižní Afriky vykročil správným směrem, když pohodlně vyhrál s pátou nasazenou Zambií výsledkem 26-00. Ač jejich hra v zápase proti jejich jižním sestrám jasně skřípala, Jižní Afrika se v průběhu turnaje neustále zlepšovala. Obranná disciplína, zacházení s míčem a výborná týmová spolupráce je učinila výjimečnými a bylo jisté, že právě tento tým je potřeba porazit.
mt: The match was started at 10:00 in great weather and except for a morning shower that quickly cleared, it was a great day for the sevens rugby. The first seeded team South Africa got off to the right start, comfortably winning with the fifth seeded Zambia 26-00. Although their play in the match against their southern sister was clearly squeaking, South Africa was steadily improving throughout the tournament. Defensive discipline, handling the ball and excellent team work made them exceptional and it was certain that this was the team to beat.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: Během posledních třiceti let se Čína vyvinula v tržní ekonomiku, přestože stále zůstává komunistickým státem. První ekonomické reformy proběhly v době, kdy byl u moci Teng Siao-pching. Ekonomická velikost Číny od té doby 90krát vzrostla. Loni Čína poprvé vyvážela více aut než Německo a vystřídala USA na dominantní pozici v oblasti automobilového průmyslu. HDP Číny může být během dvou dekád vyšší než Spojených států.
mt: During the last thirty years, China has developed into a market economy, although it still remains a communist state. The first economic reforms took place during the time of Deng Xiaoping. China's economy has since grown 90-fold. Last year, China exported more cars than Germany and replaced the United States as the dominant position in the automotive industry. China's GDP may be higher than the United States within two decades.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: Během posledních třiceti let se Čína vyvinula v tržní ekonomiku, přestože stále zůstává komunistickým státem. První ekonomické reformy proběhly v době, kdy byl u moci Teng Siao-pching. Ekonomická velikost Číny od té doby 90krát vzrostla. Loni Čína poprvé vyvážela více aut než Německo a vystřídala USA na dominantní pozici v oblasti automobilového průmyslu. HDP Číny může být během dvou dekád vyšší než Spojených států.
mt: During the last thirty years, China has developed into a market economy, although it still remains a communist state. The first economic reforms took place during the time of Deng Xiaoping. China's economy has since grown 90-fold. Last year, China exported more cars than Germany and replaced the United States as the dominant position in the automotive industry. China's GDP may be higher than the United States within two decades.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: „Pokusíme se snížit emise oxidu uhličitého na jednotku HDP o význačný rozdíl z úrovně v roce 2005 do roku 2020,“ řekl Hu. Ohledně omezení neuvedl žádné číslo a řekl, že bude stanoveno na základě ekonomického výkonu Číny. Hu povzbuzoval rozvojové země, aby „se vyhýbaly starým způsobům, kdy nejdříve dojde ke znečištění a až poté k čištění.“ Dodal, že by „však neměli být žádáni o převzetí povinností, které přesahují jejich fázi vývoje, odpovědnost a schopnosti.“
mt: "We will try to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a significant margin from the 2005 level to 2020," Hu said. He did not give any numbers and said it would be based on China's economic performance. Hu encouraged developing countries to "avoid the old ways of first polluting and then cleaning up." He added, however, that they should not be asked to take on responsibilities that exceed their stage of development, responsibility and ability.
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: Lékařská charita Mangola, Lékaři bez hranic a Světová zdravotnická organizace tvrdí, že jde o nejhorší historicky zaznamenané vypuknutí nemoci. Mluvčí Lékařů bez hranic Richard Veerman řekl: „Angola směřuje k nejhorší epidemii ve svých dějinách a situace zde zůstává velmi kritická.“
mt: The Medical Charities of Angola, Doctors Without Borders and the World Health Organization say this is the worst historically recorded outbreak of the disease. Doctors Without Borders spokesman Richard Veerman said, "Angola is heading towards its worst ever epidemic and the situation here remains very critical."
ref: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."

src: Vedoucí státního zastupitelství Kier Starmer QC dnes ráno učinil prohlášení o zahájení trestního řízení s Huhnem i Prycem. Huhne rezignoval a v Kabinetu jej nahradí Ed Davey MP. Od Normana Lampa MP se očekává, že po Daveym převezme práci Ministra obchodu. Huhne a Pryce by se měli dne 16. února dostavit ke smírčímu soudu ve Westminsteru.
mt: Leading State Prosecutor Kier Starmer QC made a statement this morning to begin criminal proceedings against Huhne and Pryce. Huhne resigned and in the Cabinet he was replaced by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take over Davey's work as Minister of Business. Huhne and Pryce are expected to appear in Westminster's court of arbitration on February 16.
ref: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

src: Příběh, který ve francouzské opeře představil Camille Saint-Saens, je o umělci, „jehož život se řídí láskou ke drogám a Japonsku.“ Výsledkem je, že účinkující v představení kouří na scéně marihuanové jointy a divadlo samotné podporuje obecenstvo, aby se k nim přidalo.
mt: The story, which a French opera presented by Camille Saint-Saens, is about an artist, "whose life is governed by love of drugs and Japan." The result is that performers in the performance smoke marijuana joints on stage and the theater itself supports the audience to join them.
ref: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."

src: Leonov, známý také jako „kosmonaut číslo 11“, byl jedním z první skupiny sovětských kosmonautů. 18. března 1965 provedl první výstup do vesmíru (EVA) a zůstal sám vně kosmické lodi po dobu více než dvanáct minut. Za svou práci obdržel nejvyšší ocenění „Hrdina Sovětského svazu“. O deset let později vedl sovětskou část mise Apollo-Sojuz, která symbolizovala konec Vesmírného závodu.
mt: 18 March 1965, Leonov became the first person to perform an EVA, and remained outside the spacecraft for more than 12 minutes. For his work he was awarded the highest honor, "Hero of the Soviet Union". Ten years later he led the Soviet part of the Apollo-Soyuz mission, which symbolized the end of the Space Race.
ref: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."

src: Po nehodě byl Gibson převezen do nemocnice, ale krátce na to zemřel. Řidič nákladního vozu, kterému je 64 let, nebyl při srážce zraněn. Samotné vozidlo bylo odvezeno z místa nehody přibližně ve 12:00 greenwichského času ve stejný den. Jedna z osob pracující v garáži poblíž místa nehody uvedla: „Děti čekaly, až budou moci přejít silnici, a všechny křičely a plakaly.“ Všichni běželi zpět z místa, kde se odehrála nehoda.
mt: After the crash, Gibson was taken to the hospital, but died shortly after. The truck driver, who is 64 years old, was not injured in the crash. The truck itself was towed away from the scene of the crash around 12:00 Greenwich Mean Time on the same day. One of the people working in the garage near the scene of the crash said, "The children were waiting to be able to cross the road, and all were crying and screaming." Everyone ran back from the scene of the crash.
ref: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."

src: Práce byla většinou teoretická, ale byl napsán program s cílem simulovat pozorování galaxie Sagittarius. Tým pátral po jevu, který by byl způsoben přílivovými silami mezi temnou hmotou této galaxie a temnou hmotou Mléčné dráhy. Stejně jako Měsíc působí silou na Zemi a způsobuje příliv a odliv mořské hladiny, působí Mléčná dráha silou na Galaxii Střelce. Vědci dospěli k závěru, že temná hmota ovlivňuje jinou temnou hmotu stejným způsobem jako běžná hmota. Tato teorie říká, že většina temné hmoty v galaxii se nachází kolem galaxie v jakési „svatozáři“ a skládá se ze spousty malých částic.
mt: The work was mostly theoretical, but a program was written to simulate observations of the Sagittarius galaxy. The team looked for a phenomenon that would be caused by tidal forces between the dark matter of this galaxy and the dark matter of the Milky Way. Just as the Moon exerts a force on the Earth and causes tides in the ocean, the Milky Way exerts a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. Scientists concluded that dark matter affects other dark matter in the same way as ordinary matter. This theory says that most of the dark matter in the galaxy is located around the galaxy in a "halo" and consists of a large number of small particles.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: """Tuto diskuzi rozvířila kontroverze ohledně výdajů za pomoc a rekonstrukci po hurikánu Katrina; které někteří fiskální konzervativci humorně nazývali """"Bushův novoorleanský úděl."""""" Liberální kritika snah o rekonstrukci se soustředila na to, že smlouvy o rekonstrukci vyhrávali domnělí washingtonští zasvěcenci."
mt: """This discussion was sparked by controversy over spending for hurricane Katrina relief and reconstruction; which some fiscal conservatives humorously called """"Bush's new Orleans largesse."""""" Liberal criticism of reconstruction efforts focused on the fact that reconstruction contracts were awarded to alleged Washington insiders."
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

src: """Tuto diskuzi rozvířila kontroverze ohledně výdajů za pomoc a rekonstrukci po hurikánu Katrina; které někteří fiskální konzervativci humorně nazývali """"Bushův novoorleanský úděl."""""" Liberální kritika snah o rekonstrukci se soustředila na to, že smlouvy o rekonstrukci vyhrávali domnělí washingtonští zasvěcenci."
mt: """This discussion was sparked by controversy over spending for hurricane Katrina relief and reconstruction; which some fiscal conservatives humorously called """"Bush's new Orleans largesse."""""" ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

src: Když se kapsle dostane na Zemi a vstoupí do atmosféry asi v 5 hodin ráno (východního času), očekává se, že lidem v severní Kalifornii, Oregonu, Nevadě a Utahu se spustí světelná show. Kapsle bude vypadat jako padající hvězda letící po obloze. Kabina se bude pohybovat rychlostí 12.8 km respektive 8 mil za sekundu; cesta ze San Francisca do Los Angeles by jí tak trvala jednu minutu. Stardust stanoví nový rekord pro nejrychlejší kosmickou loď, která se vrátí na Zemi, čímž překoná předchozí rekord z května 1969 vzniklý při návratu řídícího modulu Apolla X. „Přesune se přes západní pobřeží severní Kalifornie a rozsvítí oblohu od Kalifornie přes střední Oregon a dále přes Nevadu a Idaho až do Utahu,“ uvedl projektový manažer Stardust Tom Duxbury.
mt: When the capsule enters the atmosphere around 5 a.m. (Pacific time), people in northern California, Oregon, Nevada and Utah are expected to see a light show. The capsule will look like a falling star streaking across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at 12.8 kilometers per second, or 8 miles per second; the trip from San Francisco to Los Angeles would take it one minute. Stardust will set a new record for the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, surpassing the previous record set in May 1969 by the Apollo X command module. "It will cross the western coast of northern California and light up the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho to Utah," said Stardust project manager Tom Duxbury.
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.
