src: Doktor, který pracoval v Dětské nemocnici v Pittsburghu, bude podle úřadů v Ohiu souzen za vraždu s přitěžujícími okolnostmi poté, co byla jeho matka ve středu nalezena mrtvá v kufru svého auta. 29letý Dr. Malar Balasubramanian byl nalezen v Blue Ash v Ohiu, předměstí vzdáleném zhruba 15 mil na sever od Cincinnati. Ležel vedle cesty v tričku a spodním prádle, zjevně pod vlivem silných léků. Zavedla policisty ke svému černému vozidlu Oldsmobile Intrigue, které se nacházelo zhruba 150 metrů daleko. Tam našli tělo třiapadesátileté Saroji Balasubramanianové zakryté zakrvácenými přikrývkami. Policie řekla, že tělo vypadalo, jako by tam bylo zhruba den.
mt: 29-year-old Dr. Malar Balasubramanian was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb about 15 miles north of Cincinnati. He was lying by the side of the road in a t-shirt and underwear, apparently under the influence of strong drugs. Police led him to his black Oldsmobile Intrigue, which was about 150 meters away. There they found the body of 53-year-old Saroji Balasubramanian covered with blood-soaked blankets. Police said the body looked like it had been there about a day.
ref: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.

src: Doktor, který pracoval v Dětské nemocnici v Pittsburghu, bude podle úřadů v Ohiu souzen za vraždu s přitěžujícími okolnostmi poté, co byla jeho matka ve středu nalezena mrtvá v kufru svého auta. 29letý Dr. Malar Balasubramanian byl nalezen v Blue Ash v Ohiu, předměstí vzdáleném zhruba 15 mil na sever od Cincinnati. Ležel vedle cesty v tričku a spodním prádle, zjevně pod vlivem silných léků. Zavedla policisty ke svému černému vozidlu Oldsmobile Intrigue, které se nacházelo zhruba 150 metrů daleko. Tam našli tělo třiapadesátileté Saroji Balasubramanianové zakryté zakrvácenými přikrývkami. Policie řekla, že tělo vypadalo, jako by tam bylo zhruba den.
mt: 29-year-old Dr. Malar Balasubramanian was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb about 15 miles north of Cincinnati. He was lying by the side of the road in a t-shirt and underwear, apparently under the influence of strong drugs. Police led him to his black Oldsmobile Intrigue, which was about 150 meters away. There they found the body of 53-year-old Saroji Balasubramanian covered with blood-soaked blankets. Police said the body looked like it had been there about a day.
ref: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.

src: Jedná se o největší akvizici v historii eBay. Firma doufá, že diverzifikuje své zdroje příjmů a získá popularitu v oblastech, kde drží silnou pozici Skype, jako je Čína, východní Evropa a Brazílie.
mt: It is the largest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its revenue sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe and Brazil.
ref: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.

src: Když po transportu raněných do nemocnice boje ustaly, asi 40 zbylých vězňů zůstalo na dvoře a odmítlo se vrátit do svých cel. Vyjednavači se snažili napravit situaci, ale požadavky vězňů nejsou jasné. Mezi 22:00–23:00 MDT byl vězni na dvoře založen požár. Brzy poté do prostoru vstoupili těžkooděnci a rozehnali vězně slzným plynem. Hasičské záchranné týmy nakonec ve 23:35 oheň uhasily.
mt: When the transport of wounded to the hospital ended, about 40 remaining prisoners remained on the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to resolve the situation, but the prisoners' demands are unclear. Between 22:00–23:00 MDT a fire was lit by prisoners on the yard. Shortly thereafter, the prisoners were dispersed by tear gas. Firefighting teams eventually extinguished the fire at 23:35.
ref: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear. Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.

src: Toto vyjádření vysílané živě v televizi představuje první případ, kdy íránské oficiální zdroje připustily, že sankce mají jistý účinek. Zahrnují finanční restrikce a zákaz Evropské unie na vývoz ropy, z něhož plyne 80 % zahraničních příjmů íránské ekonomiky. V posledním měsíčním hlášení OPEC uvedl, že export surové nafty dosáhl nejnižší úrovně za poslední dvě desetiletí: 2,8 milionu barelů za den. Nejvyšší vůdce země Ájatolláh Sajjid Alí Chameneí popsal závislost na ropě jako „past“ datující se před Islámskou revoluci v Íránu roku 1979, od které by se země měla osvobodit.
mt: This statement, broadcast live on television, represents the first time Iranian official sources have admitted that sanctions have some effect. They include financial restrictions and an EU ban on oil exports, from which 80 percent of Iran's foreign income derives. In its latest monthly report, OPEC said crude exports reached their lowest level in the last two decades: 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's highest leader, Ayatollah Sayyid Ali Khamenei, described dependence on oil as a "trap" dating back to the Islamic Revolution in Iran in 1979, from which the country should be freed.
ref: "The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect. They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income. In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as ""a trap"" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself."

src: Ve Francii probíhá hlasování tradičně bez moderních technologií: voliči se izolují v kabině a do obálky vloží předem vytištěný list papíru, v němž uvedou kandidáta, kterého si zvolili. Poté, co úředníci ověří totožnost voliče, volič vhodí obálku do urny a podepíše seznam voličů. Francouzský volební zákon obsahuje celkem přísnou kodifikaci průběhu voleb. Od roku 1988 musí být volební urny průhledné, aby voliči i pozorovatelé mohli dosvědčit, že se v nich nenacházely žádné obálky ještě před začátkem hlasování a že nebyly přidány žádné jiné obálky než ty, které vložili spočítaní a oprávnění voliči. Kandidáti mohou vyslat zástupce, kteří jsou pak svědky celého procesu. Večer jsou hlasy sečteny dobrovolníky pod přísným dohledem a podle specifických postupů.
mt: In France, voting traditionally takes place without modern technology: voters are isolated in a booth and insert a pre-printed piece of paper into an envelope, indicating the candidate they have chosen. After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter deposits the envelope into a ballot box and signs a list of voters. The French electoral law contains a very strict codification of the voting process. Since 1988, voting boxes must be transparent, so that voters and observers can attest that no envelopes were present in them before the start of voting and that no other envelopes were added than those inserted by counted and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives who are then witnesses to the entire process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under strict supervision and according to specific procedures.
ref: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope. After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll. French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.

src: V případě potvrzení završí tento nález Allenovo pátrání po Musashi, které trvá osm let. Po mapování mořského dna byl vrak nalezen pomocí dálkově ovládaného podvodní vozidla (ROV). Jakožto jeden z nejbohatších lidí světa Allen podle všeho investoval velkou část svého majetku do námořního objevování a zahájil snahu najít Musashi z důvodu celoživotního zájmu o války.
mt: If confirmed, this find will end Allen's eight-year search for Musashi. The wreck was found using a remotely operated underwater vehicle (ROV). As one of the richest people in the world, Allen reportedly invested a large portion of his fortune in ocean exploration and began the quest to find Musashi due to a lifelong interest in wars.
ref: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV. One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.

src: Televizní reportáže ukazují bílý kouř stoupající z elektrárny. Místní úřady varují obyvatele v blízkosti továrny, aby nevycházeli z domů, vypnuli si klimatizaci a nepili kohoutkovou vodu. Podle japonské jaderné agentury bylo v závodě identifikováno radioaktivní cesium a jód. Podle spekulací úřadů by to mohlo být náznakem toho, že zdejší nádoby s uranovým palivem mohly prasknout a palivo nyní uniká.
mt: Television reports show white smoke rising from the power plant. Local authorities warn residents near the plant not to go outside, turn off their air conditioning and not drink tap water. According to the Japanese nuclear agency, radioactive cesium and iodine were identified in the factory. According to speculation by officials, this may be a sign that the uranium fuel containers in the plant may have burst and the fuel is now leaking.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water. According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant. Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dr. Tony Moll objevil tuberkulózu (XDR-TB) extrémně odolnou vůči lékům v jihoafrickém regionu KwaZulu-Natal. V rozhovoru uvedl, že nová varianta je „vysoce znepokojivá, až alarmující, z důvodu vysoké zhoubnosti.“ Doktor Moll si myslí, že někteří pacienti mohli tento virus chytit v nemocnici, a nejméně dva z nich byli nemocniční zdravotníci. Za dobu jednoho roku může nakažený člověk nakazit 10 až 15 blízkých kontaktů. Avšak procento XDR-TB v celé skupině lidí s tuberkulózou se stále zdá nízké; 6 000 lidí z celého počtu 330 000 infikovaných v jeden určitý moment v Jižní Africe.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered XDR-TB (extremely drug-resistant tuberculosis) in the South African region of KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview he said, "This is a very worrying, even alarming, development because of its virulence." Dr. Moll believes that some patients may have contracted the virus in the hospital, and at least two of them were hospital health workers. In one year a single infected person can infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems low; 6,000 out of 330,000 infected in South Africa at any one time.
ref: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said the new variant was ""very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."" Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa."

src: NextGen je systém, který by podle agentury FAA umožnil letadlům létat kratšími trasami a každý rok tak ušetřit miliony galonů paliva a snížit uhlíkové emise. V porovnání s technologií založenou na pozemních radarech používá satelitní technologii, která umožňuje kontrolorům letového provozu detekovat letadla s větší přesností a poskytuje pilotům přesnější informace.
mt: NextGen is a system that would allow planes to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel and reduce carbon emissions each year, according to FAA. In comparison to technology based on ground radars, it uses satellite technology, which allows air traffic controllers to detect planes with greater accuracy and provides pilots with more accurate information.
ref: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.

src: Historici kritizovali minulé postupy FBI za to, že soustředí zdroje na snadno vyřešitelné případy, obzvláště krádeže aut, s úmyslem zvednout statistickou úspěšnost agentury. Kongres začal financovat iniciativu proti obscénnostem ve fiskálním roce 2005 a stanovil, že FBI musí vyhradit 10 agentů zabývajících se pornografií dospělých.
mt: Historians criticized past FBI practices for focusing resources on easily solved cases, especially car thefts, with the intent of boosting the agency's statistical success rate. Congress began funding the anti-obscenity initiative in fiscal year 2005 and mandated that the FBI must set aside 10 agents to deal with adult pornography.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Letoun JAS 39C Gripen havaroval na přistávací dráze přibližně kolem 9:30 h ráno místního času (02:30 UTC) a explodoval, což vyústilo v uzavření letiště pro komerční lety. Pilot byl identifikován jako velitel letky Dilokrit Pattavee. Místní média uvedla, že hasičské vozidlo letiště se během odpovídání převalilo.
mt: 9:30 local time (02:30 UTC) and exploded, resulting in the closure of the airport for commercial flights. The pilot was identified as squadron leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reported that a fire engine at the airport rolled over while responding.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

src: Letoun JAS 39C Gripen havaroval na přistávací dráze přibližně kolem 9:30 h ráno místního času (02:30 UTC) a explodoval, což vyústilo v uzavření letiště pro komerční lety. Pilot byl identifikován jako velitel letky Dilokrit Pattavee. Místní média uvedla, že hasičské vozidlo letiště se během odpovídání převalilo.

src: Během 60. let 20. století pracoval Brzezinski pro Johna F. Kennedyho jako jeho poradce a poté pro administrativu Lyndona B. Johnsona. Během výběrů v roce 1976 radil Carterovi v oblasti zahraniční politiky, poté od roku 1977 do roku 1981 působil jako poradce pro národní bezpečnost (NSA), kde nahradil Henryho Kissingera. V NSA pomáhal Carterovi při diplomatickém řešení světových záležitostí, jako jsou Dohody z Camp Davidu (1978); normalizace vztahů mezi USA a Čínou na konci 70. let; íránská revoluce, která vedla k zadržení amerických rukojmí v Íránu (1979); a sovětská invaze v Afghánistánu (1979).
mt: During the 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his foreign policy advisor and later for the administration of Lyndon B. Johnson. In 1976, he advised Carter in the area of foreign policy, and then from 1977 to 1981 he served as National Security Advisor, replacing Henry Kissinger. In NSA, he helped Carter diplomatically resolve world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords (1978); normalization of relations between the United States and China at the end of the 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the seizure of American hostages in Iran (1979); and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan (1979).
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Bobek, narozen v chorvatském hlavním městě Záhřebu, dosáhl slávy během hraní za tým Partizan Bělehrad. Přidal se k nim roku 1945 a zůstal až do roku 1958. Během doby, kdy byl s týmem, vsítil 403 gólů v 468 zápasech. Žádný jiný hráč nikdy nenastoupil za klub tolikrát ani nevstřelil tolik gólů jako Bobek. V roce 1995 byl zvolen nejlepším hráčem v historii Partizánů.
mt: Bobek, born in the Croatian capital of Zagreb, achieved fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During the time he was with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 games. No other player ever played for the club as many times or scored as many goals as Bobek. In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan history.
ref: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances. No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.

src: Hesperonychus elizabethae je druh z čeledi Dromaeosauridae a je příbuzný rodu Velociraptora. Tento plně opeřený, teplokrevný dravý pták údajně chodil vzpřímeně po dvou nohách s drápy jako Velociraptor. Jeho druhý dráp byl větší, a proto byl pojmenován Hesperonychus, což znamená „západní dráp“.
mt: Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is related to the genus Velociraptor. This fully feathered, warm-blooded predatory bird is said to have walked upright on two legs with claws like Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, and so it was named Hesperonychus, meaning "western claw".
ref: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor . This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means ""western claw."""

src: Večírku uspořádaného za účelem oslavy prvního výročí páru, jehož svatba se konala loni, se zúčastnilo nejméně 100 lidí. Podle oficiálních zdrojů byla formální akce k výročí naplánována na pozdější datum. Pár se před rokem vzal v Texasu a do Buffala přijel na oslavu s přáteli a příbuznými. Jedním ze čtyř zabitých při střelbě byl 30letý muž narozený v Buffalu, ale jeho manželka nebyla zraněna.
mt: 100 people attended the evening party celebrating the couple's first anniversary, whose wedding took place last year. According to official sources, the formal anniversary event was planned for a later date. The couple married in Texas last year and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and family. One of the four killed in the shooting was a 30-year-old man born in Buffalo, but his wife was not injured.
ref: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year. A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said. The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.

src: Loď Luno měla při ztroskotání natankováno 120–160 metrů krychlových paliva a silný vítr i vlny ji natlačily do přístavní hráze. Vrtulníky zachránily 12 členů posádky a jediným zraněním byl zlomený nos. 100metrová loď byla na cestě vyzvednout svůj obvyklý náklad hnojiv a úředníci se zpočátku obávali, že by loď mohla náklad vylít.
mt: The Luno was fully fueled when it ran aground, and strong winds and waves pushed it into the harbor breakwater. Helicopters rescued 12 crew members, and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-foot vessel was on its way to pick up its usual load of fertilizer, and officials initially feared the ship would spill its cargo.
ref: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater. Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.

src: Kromě režie se Vautier proslavil například hladovkou z roku 1973, kterou držel na protest proti politické cenzuře. Francouzské právo bylo změněno.  Jeho aktivismus začal v 15 letech, když se připojil k francouzskému odporu během druhé světové války. Sám sebe zdokumentoval v knize z roku 1998. V 60. letech minulého století zamířil zpět do nově nezávislého Alžírska, aby zde vyučoval filmovou režii.
mt: Besides his directing, Vautier was also known for a 1973 hunger strike he held in protest of political censorship. French law was changed. His activism began at age 15, when he joined the French resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a 1998 book. In the 1960s, he returned to newly independent Algeria to teach film directing.
ref: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship. French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a 1998 book. In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.

src: Na pohřeb se do Říma vydalo více než čtyři miliony lidí. Počet přítomných lidí byl natolik velký, že nebylo možné, aby se všichni dostali na pohřeb na náměstí svatého Petra. Na různých místech v Římě byly umístěny velké televizní obrazovky, aby lidé mohli sledovat ceremonii. V mnoha dalších městech v Itálii a ve zbytku světa, zejména v Polsku, probíhala podobná promítání, na která se dívalo velké množství lidí.
mt: 4 million people attended the funeral in Rome. The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for all to attend the funeral on St. Peter's Square. Large television screens were placed in various places in Rome so that people could watch the ceremony. Similar screenings were held in many other cities in Italy and the rest of the world, especially in Poland, to which a large number of people came.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony. In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Podle zpráv byt na Macbeth Street explodoval kvůli úniku plynu. Zástupce plynárenské společnosti dorazil na místo poté, co soused nahlásil únik plynu. Když úředník dorazil, byt explodoval. Nebyla hlášena žádná vážná zranění, ale přinejmenším pět lidí s příznaky šoku bylo ošetřeno na místě výbuchu. V bytě se nikdo nenacházel. Bezprostředně poté bylo z oblasti evakuováno téměř 100 stálých obyvatel.
mt: According to reports, the house on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. A gas company representative arrived at the scene after a neighbor reported a gas leak. When the official arrived, the house exploded. No serious injuries were reported, but at least five people with shock symptoms were treated at the scene of the explosion. No one was in the house. Shortly afterwards, almost 100 permanent residents were evacuated from the area.
ref: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. When the official arrived, the apartment exploded. No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock. No one was inside the apartment. At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.

src: Oběťmi se stali Nicholas Alden (25 let) a Zachary Cuddeback (21 let). Cuddeback byl řidič. Edgar Veguilla si zranil paži a čelisti, zatímco Kristoffer Schneider musel podstoupit chirurgickou rekonstrukci obličeje. Když Uka namířil na hlavu páté osoby, zbraň mu selhala. Schneider má trvalé bolesti, je slepý na jedno oko, chybí mu část lebky a prodělal rekonstrukci tváře za použití titanu. Schneider svědčil prostřednictvím video hovoru ze základny sil USAF ve své rodné zemi.
mt: 25-year-old Nicholas Alden and 21-year-old Zachary Cuddeback were killed. Cuddeback was the driver. Edgar Veguilla injured his arm and jaw, while Kristoffer Schneider had to undergo facial reconstruction surgery. When Uka aimed at the head of the fifth person, the gun failed. Schneider has permanent pain, is blind in one eye, is missing part of his skull and underwent facial reconstruction using titanium. Schneider testified via video call from his home country's US Air Force base.
ref: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver. Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face. Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium. Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.

src: Golf i ragby se vrátí na olympijské hry. Mezinárodní olympijský výbor dnes hlasoval o zahrnutí sportů na svém zasedání výkonné rady v Berlíně. Ragby, konkrétně ragbyová unie, a golf dostaly při zvažování účasti na olympijských hrách přednost před pěti dalšími sporty. Squash, karate a jízda na kolečkových bruslích se pokusily dostat na program olympiády stejně jako baseball a softball, které byly vyloučeny z olympijských her v roce 2005. Hlasování musí stále být ratifikováno celým MOV na jeho říjnovém setkání v Kodani.
mt: Golf and rugby will return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf received preference over five other sports. Squash, karate and roller skating attempted to get on the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were removed from the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the entire IOC at its October meeting in Copenhagen.
ref: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.

src: 24. září 1759 podepsal Artur Guiness smlouvu o pronájmu pivovaru Brána Sv. Jakuba v Dublinu v Irsku na 9 000 let. O 250 let později se Guinness stává celosvětovým podnikem s obratem více než 10 miliard euro (14,7 miliardy dolarů) ročně.
mt: 24 September 1759 Arthur Guinness signed a lease for the St. James's Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland, for 9,000 years. 250 years later, Guinness becomes a global company with a revenue of more than 10 billion euros (14.7 billion dollars) annually.
ref: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.

src: 24. září 1759 podepsal Artur Guiness smlouvu o pronájmu pivovaru Brána Sv. Jakuba v Dublinu v Irsku na 9 000 let. O 250 let později se Guinness stává celosvětovým podnikem s obratem více než 10 miliard euro (14,7 miliardy dolarů) ročně.
mt: 24 September 1759 Arthur Guinness signed a lease for the St. James's Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland, for 9,000 years. 250 years later, Guinness becomes a global company with a revenue of more than 10 billion euros (14.7 billion dollars) annually.

src: U mrtvé divoké kachny nalezené v pondělí v mokřině poblíž Lyonu na východě Francie byl potvrzen kmen ptačí chřipky H5N1, který je smrtelný pro člověka. Francie je sedmou zemí v Evropské unii, která byla postižena tímto virem, a to po Rakousku, Německu, Slovinsku, Bulharsku, Řecku a Itálii. Podezřelé případy H5N1 v Chorvatsku a Dánsku zůstávají nepotvrzeny.
mt: The strain of bird flu found in a wild duck found Monday in a marsh near Lyon in eastern France was confirmed as H5N1, which is deadly to humans. France is the seventh country in the European Union to be hit by this virus, after Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected H5N1 cases in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.
ref: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.

Francie je sedmou zemí v Evropské unii, která byla postižena tímto virem, a to po Rakousku, Německu, Slovinsku, Bulharsku, Řecku a Itálii. src: Mírové síly OSN, které dorazily na Haiti po zemětřesení v roce 2010, jsou obviňovány ze šíření choroby, která propukla poblíž tábora jednotek. Podle právní žaloby nebyl odpad z tábora OSN správně dezinfikován, což umožnilo bakteriím vstoupit do přítoku řeky Artibonite, která je jednou z největších na Haiti. Před příchodem vojsk se Haiti nesetkávala s problémy spojenými s touto nemocí od počátku 19. století. Institut spravedlnost a demokracie na Haiti zmínil nezávislé studie, které naznačují, že nemoc na Haiti nevědomky přivlekly nepálské mírové jednotky OSN. Danielle Lantagne, expertka OSN na toto onemocnění, uvedla, že epidemie byla pravděpodobně způsobena mírovými jednotkami.
mt: The United Nations peacekeepers who arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake are being blamed for spreading the disease that broke out near the peacekeepers' camp. According to a legal complaint, the peacekeepers' waste was not properly decontaminated, allowing bacteria to enter the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest rivers. Haiti had not had problems with this disease since the early 19th century. The Institute for Justice and Democracy in Haiti cited independent studies that suggest the disease was unknowingly brought to Haiti by Nepalese United Nations peacekeepers. Danielle Lantagne, a United Nations expert on this disease, said the epidemic was likely caused by the peacekeepers.
ref: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest. Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.

src: Irská vláda zdůrazňuje nutnost vytvoření parlamentní legislativy, která povede k nápravě situace. „Nyní je důležité jak z hlediska veřejného zdraví, tak i z hlediska trestního práva, aby byly zákony přijaty co nejdříve,“ prohlásil mluvčí vlády. Ministr zdravotnictví vyjádřil znepokojení jak nad blahem jednotlivců využívajících dočasné legálnosti dotčených látek, tak i nad rozsudky v trestních věcech souvisejících s drogami, které byly vyneseny od doby, co nyní protiústavní změny vstoupily v platnost.
mt: The Irish government has stressed the need for the creation of parliamentary legislation that will lead to the rectification of the situation. "It is now important both in terms of public health and in terms of criminal law that the laws be passed as soon as possible," the government spokesman said. The Minister for Health expressed concern both over the well-being of individuals using the temporary legality of the affected substances, as well as over the sentences in criminal cases involving drugs that have been handed down since the now unconstitutional changes came into effect.
ref: "The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. ""It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible"", said a government spokesperson. The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."

src: Christopher Garcia, mluvčí losangeleské policie, uvedl, že podezřelý pachatel je vyšetřován za přestupek, nikoliv za vandalismus. Cedule nebyla fyzicky poškozena, neboť změny byly provedeny pomocí černých plachet vyzdobené symboly míru a srdce, aby upravily písmeno „O“ na malé „e“.
mt: Christopher Garcia, a spokesman for the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspect is being investigated for a misdemeanor, not vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged, as changes were made using black banners adorned with peace and heart symbols to alter the letter "O" to a small "e".
ref: "Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the ""O"" to read lowercase ""e""."

src: Karno je velmi známý, ale kontroverzní učitel angličtiny, který vyučoval na školách Modern Education a King's Glory a který tvrdil, že na vrcholu své kariéry měl 9 000 studentů. Ve svých poznámkách používal slova, která někteří rodiče považovali za obhroublá, a ve třídě údajně používal vulgární výrazy. Modern Education ho obvinila, že bez schválení tiskl velké reklamy na autobusy a lhal, když se prezentoval jako hlavní lektor angličtiny. Už v minulosti byl obviněn z porušování autorských práv, ale nebyl obžalován. Bývalý student řekl, že „používal během hodin slang, učil studenty navazovat známosti pomocí psaníček a choval se ke studentům jako kamarád.“
mt: Karno was a very well-known, but controversial English teacher who taught at Modern Education and King's Glory schools and who claimed to have had 9,000 students at the height of his career. In his notes he used words that some parents considered vulgar, and in the classroom he allegedly used vulgar expressions. Modern Education accused him of printing large ads on buses without permission and lying when he presented himself as the main English lecturer. He had previously been accused of copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said that "he used slang during class, taught students to make friends by writing notes, and acted towards students as a friend."
ref: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class. Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor. He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'

src: Bývalý filipínský policista držel hongkongské turisty jako rukojmí, když unesl jejich autobus v Manile, hlavním městě Filipín. Rolando Mendoza vystřelil ze své pušky M16 na turisty. Několik rukojmích bylo zachráněno a v tuto chvíli bylo potvrzeno nejméně šest mrtvých. Šest rukojmí, včetně dětí a postarších osob, bylo brzy propuštěno a stejně tak i filipínští fotografové. Fotografové později nahradili starší dámu, protože potřebovala na toaletu. Mendoza byl zastřelen.
mt: A former Philippine policeman held Hong Kong tourists hostage when he hijacked their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages were rescued and at least six deaths were confirmed. Six hostages, including children and elderly people, were soon released and so were Filipino photographers. Photographers later replaced an older woman, because she needed to use the bathroom. Mendoza was shot.
ref: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.

src: Brazílie je největší římskokatolickou zemí na světě, a římskokatolická církev v této zemi vytrvale oponovala legalizaci sňatků osob stejného pohlaví. Národní kongres Brazílie diskutuje o legalizaci již 10 let a civilní sňatky jsou v současné době legální pouze v Rio Grande do Sul. Původní návrh zákona podala bývalá starostka São Paula, Marta Suplicy. Navrhovaný zákon byl pak upraven a nyní je v rukou Roberta Jeffersona. Protestující mají v plánu získat pod petici 1,2 miliony podpisů, než ji v listopadu předloží brazilskému národnímu kongresu.
mt: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country in the world, and the Roman Catholic Church in this country has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriages. The Brazilian National Congress has been discussing the legalization for 10 years, and civil marriages are currently legal only in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was filed by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed bill was then amended and is now in the hands of Robert Jefferson. Protesters plan to obtain 1.2 million signatures on a petition before presenting it to the Brazilian National Congress in November.
ref: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

src: Pět minut před ohňostrojem se začal zvedat vítr a asi o minutu později již dosahoval rychlosti 70 km/h... Pak přišel déšť, ale tak silný, že vás bušil do tváře jako jehličkami, pak začalo krupobití, lidé propadali panice, křičeli a zmateně pobíhali. Přišel jsem o svoji sestru a její kamarádku a v cestě jsem měl dva postižené lidi na vozíku, které lidi jen přeskakovali a odstrkávali je,“ řekl Armand Versace.
mt: 5 minutes before the fireworks started the wind began to pick up and about a minute later it was blowing at 70 km/h... Then it started to rain, but so hard that it was hitting you in the face like needles, then it started to hail, people were panicking, screaming and running around. I lost my sister and her friend and in my way I had two injured people on a wheelchair, people were just jumping over them and pushing them out of the way,” said Armand Versace.
ref: "Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them,"" Armand Versace said."

src: Vědci uvedli, že bouře, která se nacházela ve vzdálenosti 645 mil (1040 km) západně od Kapverdských ostrovů, se pravděpodobně rozptýlí dřív, než by stihla zasáhnout pevninu. Hurikán Fred momentálně dosahuje rychlosti větru 150 mil v hodině (165 km/h) a pohybuje se severozápadním směrem. Fred je nejsilnějším tropickým cyklonem, který byl tak daleko jihovýchodně v Atlantiku zaznamenán od příchodu satelitních snímků, a teprve třetí velký zaznamenaný hurikán východně od poledníku 35° západní délky.
mt: Scientists said the storm, which was located 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde Islands, was likely to dissipate before it could affect land. Hurricane Fred currently has winds of 150 mph (165 km/h) and is moving northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone so far south in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and the third major hurricane east of longitude 35° west.
ref: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.

src: Standard 802.11n operuje na frekvencích 2.4Ghz i 5.0Ghz. Tak bude možná zpětná kompatibilita s normami 802.11a, 802.11b a 802.11g za předpokladu, že základna má duální vysílač. Rychlosti 802.11n jsou podstatně vyšší než v případě jeho předchůdců s maximální teoretickou propustností 600 Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n operates on 2.4GHz and 5.0GHz frequencies. So there may be backward compatibility with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g standards, assuming the base station has a dual transmitter. 802.11n speeds are significantly higher than its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600 Mbit/s.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios. The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Standard 802.11n operuje na frekvencích 2.4Ghz i 5.0Ghz. Tak bude možná zpětná kompatibilita s normami 802.11a, 802.11b a 802.11g za předpokladu, že základna má duální vysílač. Rychlosti 802.11n jsou podstatně vyšší než v případě jeho předchůdců s maximální teoretickou propustností 600 Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n operates on 2.4GHz and 5.0GHz frequencies. src: Zlatý olympijský medailista měl na Commonwealth Games plavat 100 m a 200 m volným stylem a ve třech štafetách, ale vzhledem k jeho námitkám se pochybovalo o jeho způsobilosti. Nemohl si vzít lék potřebný pro překonání bolesti, jelikož léčiva jsou na Hrách zakázána.
mt: 2012 Olympic gold medalist was to swim the 100 and 200 meter freestyle and in three relays, but due to his objections was questioned about his fitness. He could not take the medication needed to overcome pain, as drugs are banned at the Games.
ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

src: Mezinárodní mapa zemětřesení agentury The United States Geological Survey neukázala na Islandu v předchozím týdnu žádná zemětřesení. Islandský meteorologický úřad rovněž nehlásil v oblasti Hekla za posledních 48 hodin žádné zemětřesení. Významná seismická aktivita, která vyústila ve změnu fáze, se objevila 10. března na severovýchodní straně vrcholové kaldery sopky. Na úpatí hory byly nahlášeny temné mraky nesouvisející se sopečnou aktivitou. Tyto mraky přispěly k nejistotě, zda skutečně došlo k erupci.
mt: The United States Geological Survey's international earthquake map did not show any earthquakes in Iceland in the previous week. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also did not report any earthquakes in the area of Hekla in the past 48 hours. Significant seismic activity, which resulted in a change of phase, occurred on March 10 on the northeastern side of the summit caldera of the volcano. Dark clouds unrelated to volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. These clouds contributed to uncertainty as to whether an eruption actually occurred.
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

src: Bezpilotní lunární družice Chandrayaan-1 vyslala svoji Měsíční povrchovou sondu (MIP), která se kolem povrchu Měsíce přehnala rychlostí 1,5 kilometru za vteřinu (3000 mil za hodinu) a úspěšně přistála nárazem poblíž jižního pólu Měsíce. Kromě tří důležitých vědeckých nástrojů nesla měsíční sonda i obrázek indické národní vlajky namalovaný na všech svých stranách.
mt: The Moon Impact Probe (MIP) of the Indian lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 flew over the lunar surface at 1.5 kilometers per second (3,000 miles per hour) and successfully impacted the surface near the lunar south pole. In addition to three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe carried an image of the Indian national flag painted on all its sides.
ref: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole. Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

src: První případy nemoci se v této sezóně objevily na konci července. Tato nemoc je přenášena vepři a k lidem se dostává skrze komáry. Nákaza přiměla indickou vládu k přijetí opatření, jako je rozmístění lovců prasat ve vážně zasažených oblastech, distribuce tisíců záclon proti komárům a postřik pesticidy. Vláda také slíbila několik milionů dávek vakcíny proti encefalitidě, které pomohou připravit zdravotnické agentury na příští rok. Plány vakcinace určené k doručení do historicky nejohroženějších oblastí za tento rok byly odloženy kvůli nedostatku prostředků a nízké prioritizaci oproti ostatním chorobám.
mt: The first cases of the disease appeared at the end of July in this season. The disease is transmitted by wild boars and to humans by mosquitoes. The Indian government has taken measures such as deploying pig hunters in the worst-hit areas, distributing thousands of mosquito nets and spraying pesticides. The government also promised several million doses of encephalitis vaccine, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Plans for vaccination intended for delivery to historically most vulnerable areas this year were postponed due to lack of funds and low prioritization compared to other diseases.
ref: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides. Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.

src: Navrhovaná úprava již prošla oběma komorami v roce 2011. Při tomto projednávání návrhu zákonů byla druhá věta nejprve odstraněna ve Sněmovně reprezentantů a v této podobě prošla v rámci Senátního pondělku. Neúspěch druhého výroku, který navrhuje zákaz občanských sňatků stejného pohlaví, by mohl do budoucna otevřít dveře těmto občanským sňatkům. Po skončení tohoto procesu bude zákon HJR-3 znovu posouzen nově zvoleným zákonodárným shromážděním buď v roce 2015, nebo 2016, aby mohl jeho schvalovací proces pokračovat.
mt: The proposed amendment passed both chambers in 2011.  During the consideration of the bill, the second clause was first removed in the House of Representatives and passed in this form during the Senate's Monday.  The failure of the second clause, which proposes a ban on same-sex civil marriages, could open the door to these civil marriages in the future.  After this process is completed, the bill HJR-3 will be reconsidered by the newly elected legislative body either in 2015 or 2016, in order to continue its approval process.
ref: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

src: „Panama Papers“ je zastřešující pojem pro zhruba deset milionů dokumentů od panamské advokátní kanceláře Mossack Fonseca, které unikly do médií na jaře 2016. Dokumenty ukázaly, že čtrnáct bank pomohlo bohatým klientům skrýt miliardy amerických dolarů, aby se vyhnuli daním a jiným předpisům. Britské noviny The Guardian naznačily, že Deutsche Bank kontrolovala zhruba třetinu z 1 200 fiktivních společností, které k tomuto účelu sloužily. Došlo k celosvětovým protestům, několika trestním stíháním a lídři islandské a pákistánské vlády rezignovali.
mt: "Panama Papers" is a catch-all term for about 11.5 million documents from the Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, which leaked into the media in the spring of 2016. The documents showed that fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of dollars to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspapers The Guardian suggested that Deutsche Bank controlled about a third of the 1,200 fictitious companies that served this purpose. There were global protests, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the Icelandic and Pakistani governments resigned.
ref: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."

src: Letecké nehody jsou v Íránu běžné, protože zdejší stárnoucí flotila není dostatečně udržována pro civilní ani vojenské operace. Mezinárodní sankce znamenaly, že nelze zakoupit nová letadla. Na začátku tohoto týdne při havárii vrtulníku zahynuli tři lidé a další tři byli zraněni. Minulý měsíc zažil Írán nejhorší leteckou katastrofu posledních let, kdy se zřítilo letadlo mířící do Arménie. Všech 168 osob na palubě zahynulo. V tom stejném měsíci přejelo jiné dopravní letadlo přistávací dráhu v Mašhadu a narazilo do zdi. Nehoda měla sedmnáct obětí.
mt: Aerial accidents are common in Iran, as its aging fleet is not adequately maintained for civil or military operations. International sanctions meant new aircraft could not be purchased. Earlier this week, three people died and three others were injured in a helicopter crash. Last month, Iran experienced its worst air disaster in years, when a plane bound for Armenia crashed. All 168 people on board were killed. In the same month, another commercial aircraft ran off the runway in Mashhad and hit a wall. The accident had seventeen casualties.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: Irácká studijní skupina představila svoji zprávu dnes v 12:00 GMT. Varuje před nemožností zaručit, že jakkoliv cílená aktivita v současném Iráku zastaví sektářské boje, narůstající násilí nebo sklouzávání k chaosu. Zpráva začíná prosbou o otevřenou debatu a vytvoření konsensu ve Spojených státech o politice vůči Blízkému východu. Zpráva je do velké míry kritická vůči téměř všem aspektům současného postupu exekutivy směrem k Iráku a vyžaduje okamžitou změnu směru. První z jeho 78 doporučení je, že před koncem tohoto roku by měla být podniknuta nová diplomatická iniciativa za účelem zajistit hranice Iráku proti nepřátelským intervencím a obnovit diplomatické vztahy s jeho sousedy.
mt: 12:00 GMT, an Iraqi study group presented its report today. It warns that it is impossible to guarantee that any targeted activity in contemporary Iraq will stop sectarian fighting, increasing violence or sliding into chaos. The report begins with a plea for an open debate and the creation of a consensus in the United States about policy towards the Middle East. The report is largely critical of almost all aspects of the current executive approach to Iraq and demands an immediate change of course. The first of its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be undertaken by the end of this year to ensure Iraq's borders against hostile interventions and to restore diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Podle Ansa „měla policie obavu, že několik zásahů na nejvyšší úrovni by mohlo zapříčinit otevřenou válku o následnictví. Policie uvedla, že Lo Piccolo měl navrch, protože byl pravou rukou Provenzana v Palermu a díky větším zkušenostem si získal respekt starší generace šéfů, když prosazovali Provenzanovu politiku co nejméně nápadného rozšiřování jejich sféry vlivu. Tito šéfové byli Provenzanem ovládnuti, když ukončil válku vedenou Riinem proti státu, která si v roce 1992 vyžádala životy bojovníků s mafií Giovanniho Falconeho a Paola Borsellina.“
mt: According to Ansa, "Police had fears that several high-profile arrests could spark an open war over succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he was Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and had gained the respect of the older generation of bosses, who were Provenzano's puppets when he ended the war waged by the Riina against the state, which claimed the lives of mobsters Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: Podle Ansa „měla policie obavu, že několik zásahů na nejvyšší úrovni by mohlo zapříčinit otevřenou válku o následnictví. Policie uvedla, že Lo Piccolo měl navrch, protože byl pravou rukou Provenzana v Palermu a díky větším zkušenostem si získal respekt starší generace šéfů, když prosazovali Provenzanovu politiku co nejméně nápadného rozšiřování jejich sféry vlivu. Tito šéfové byli Provenzanem ovládnuti, když ukončil válku vedenou Riinem proti státu, která si v roce 1992 vyžádala životy bojovníků s mafií Giovanniho Falconeho a Paola Borsellina.“
mt: According to Ansa, "Police had fears that several high-profile arrests could spark an open war over succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he was Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and had gained the respect of the older generation of bosses, who were Provenzano's puppets when he ended the war waged by the Riina against the state, which claimed the lives of mobsters Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: Japonský judista Hitoši Saito, držitel dvou zlatých olympijských medailí, zemřel ve věku 54 let. Jako příčina smrti byla oznámena intrahepatální rakovina žlučovodů. Zemřel v úterý v Osace. Kromě toho, že byl olympijským a světovým šampiónem, byl Saito v době své smrti také předsedou tréninkového výboru Celojaponské judistické federace.
mt: 54-year-old Japanese judoka Hitoši Saito, who won two Olympic gold medals, died. The cause of death was intrahepatic cholangiocarcinoma. He died on Tuesday in Osaka. In addition to being an Olympic and world champion, Saito was also the chairman of the training committee of the All-Japan Judo Federation at the time of his death.
ref: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.

src: Během své cesty se Iwasaki mnohokrát dostal do potíží. Byl oloupen piráty, v Tibetu na něj zaútočil pes se vzteklinou, v Nepálu unikl sňatku a v Indii byl zatčen.
mt: During his journey, Iwasaki was robbed by pirates, attacked by a rabid dog in Tibet, escaped a marriage in Nepal, and was arrested in India.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

mt: During his journey, Iwasaki was robbed by pirates, attacked by a rabid dog in Tibet, escaped a marriage in Nepal, and was arrested in India.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Giancarlo Fisichella ztratil kontrolu nad svým vozidlem a skončil tak závod velmi brzy po startu. Jeho týmový kolega Fernando Alonso vedl po většinu závodu, to ale skončilo po jeho pit-stopu, pravděpodobně kvůli špatně zasazenému pravému přednímu kolu. Michael Schumacher ukončil svůj závod krátce po Alonsovi, a to kvůli poškození podvozku způsobenému mnoha bitvami během závodu.
mt: 2006 Formula One World Championship leader Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very early after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso led most of the race, but it ended after his pit-stop, probably due to a badly fitted right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race shortly after Alonso, due to damage to the chassis caused by many battles during the race.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: Během posledních tří měsíců bylo ze zařízení Central Booking propuštěno více než 80 zadržených, aniž by byli formálně obviněni. Letos v dubnu byl vydán dočasný soudní příkaz soudcem Glynnem proti zařízení na vymáhání propuštění osob zadržovaných déle než 24 hodin po přijetí, které nebyly vyslechnuty u soudního komisaře. Komisař v případě oprávnění vydá zatykač a formalizuje obvinění podaná zatýkajícím činitelem. Obvinění jsou poté zadána do státního počítačového systému, kde je případ sledován. Slyšení také stanovilo datum pro práva podezřelého na rychlý proces.
mt: 80 detainees were released from the Central Booking facility in the last three months without being formally charged. In April a temporary restraining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility for the release of persons detained for more than 24 hours after arrest, who have not been heard by a magistrate. The magistrate, if authorized, issues a warrant and formalizes the charges brought by the arresting officer. Charges are then entered into the state computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also set a date for the rights of the accused to a speedy process.
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: Lodin také řekl, že se příslušné orgány rozhodly druhé kolo zrušit, aby Afgháncům ušetřily výdaje a snížily bezpečnostní riziko dalších voleb. Diplomati uvádějí, že v afghánské ústavě nalezli dostatek nejednoznačnosti na to, aby toto druhé kolo označili za nepotřebné. To je v rozporu s dřívějšími zprávami, podle kterých by zrušení druhého kola bylo v rozporu s ústavou.
mt: Lodin also said that the relevant authorities decided to cancel the second round to save Afghans expenses and reduce the security risk of further elections. Diplomats say that they found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to declare the second round unnecessary. This is in contrast to earlier reports that the cancellation of the second round would be unconstitutional.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

src: Od vyhlášení pákistánské nezávislosti na britské vládě v roce 1947 jmenoval pákistánský prezident „politické zástupce“, kteří vládnou FATA a mají téměř úplnou autonomní kontrolu nad těmito oblastmi. Tito agenti mají na starost poskytování správních a právních služeb podle článku 247 ústavy Pákistánské republiky.
mt: Since the declaration of Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, Pakistani presidents have appointed "political agents" who govern FATA and have almost complete autonomous control over these areas. These agents are responsible for providing administrative and legal services under Article 247 of the Constitution of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan.
ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

src: Film, ve kterém hrají Ryan Gosling a Emma Stone, obdržel nominace ve všech hlavních kategoriích. Gosling a Stoneová získali nominace na nejlepšího herce a nejlepší herečku. K dalším nominacím patří: nejlepší film, režie, kamera, návrh kostýmů, střih, původní hudba, výprava a dekorace, střih zvuku, zvukový mix a původní scénář. Dvě písně z filmu Audition (The Fools Who Dream) a City of Stars získaly nominace na nejlepší originální píseň. Studio Lionsgate získalo 26 nominací – více než jakékoli jiné studio.
mt: 2016 Academy Awards Nominations
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: NHK také uvedla, že nukleární elektrárna Kashiwazaki Kariwa v prefektuře Niigata fungovala normálně. Společnost Hokuriku Electric Power Co. uvedla, že toto zemětřesení nemělo žádné následky a že reaktory 1 a 2 v jejich jaderné elektrárně Shika byly vypnuty. V oblasti bylo nahlášeno přibližně 9 400 domácností bez vody a přibližně 100 domácností bez elektřiny. Některé silnice byly poškozeny, železniční doprava se v ovlivněných oblastech zastavila a letiště Noto v prefektuře Ishikawa zůstává zavřené.
mt: NHK also reported that the nuclear power plant Kashiwazaki Kariwa in Niigata Prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. said that this earthquake had no consequences and that the reactors 1 and 2 in their Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. About 9,400 households were reported without water and about 100 households without electricity. Some roads were damaged, train service was stopped in affected areas and the Noto airport in Ishikawa Prefecture remains closed.
ref: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

src: Podle úniku se dokument bude týkat pohraničních sporů, ve kterých chce Palestina zachovat hranice podle toho, jak byly před válkou na Středním východě v roce 1967. Další zahrnutá témata podle všeho obsahují budoucí stát Jeruzalém, který je posvátný pro oba národy i problematiku Jordánského údolí. Izrael požaduje trvalou vojenskou přítomnost v údolí po dobu deseti let po podpisu smlouvy, zatímco Palestinská autonomie souhlasí s vojenskou přítomností jen na pět let.
mt: According to leaks, the document will deal with border disputes, in which Palestine wants to maintain borders as they were before the war in the Middle East in 1967. Other topics included according to all will contain the future state of Jerusalem, which is sacred for both nations and the Jordan Valley problem. Israel demands a permanent military presence in the valley for ten years after signing the contract, while the Palestinian autonomy agrees to military presence only for five years.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: Ma se narodil v Honkongu, studoval na New York University a Harward Law School a byl držitelem americké „zelené karty“ pro trvalé rezidenty. Hsieh během volby naznačil, že by Ma mohla během krize utéct ze země. Hsieh také argumentoval, že fotogenický Ma má více stylu než podstaty. Ma navzdory těmto obviněním hladce vyhrál na platformě prosazující užší vazby s čínskou pevninou.
mt: Ma was born in Hong Kong, studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and was a holder of an American "green card" for permanent residents. Hsieh during the election indicated that Ma could flee the country during the crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma had more style than substance. Ma, despite these accusations, easily won on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland.
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: Jakmile bylo očividné, že mnoho rodin hledalo právní pomoc při boji proti vystěhování, bylo 20. března uspořádáno setkání v East Bay Community Law Center pro oběti podvodu s bydlením. Když nájemníci začali sdělovat, co se jim stalo, většina zúčastněných rodin si najednou uvědomila že Carolyn Wilson z OHA ukradla jejich kauce a zmizela z města. Nájemníci Lockwood Gardens se domnívají, že může dojít k vystěhování dalších 40 nebo více rodin, protože se dozvěděli, že policejní oddělení OHA také vyšetřuje další veřejné bytové nemovitosti v Oaklandu, které by mohly být zapleteny do podvodu s bydlením.
mt: 20 March was organized a meeting at East Bay Community Law Center for victims of housing fraud. When tenants began to report what happened to them, most of the families realized that Carolyn Wilson of OHA had stolen their deposits and disappeared from the city. Lockwood Gardens tenants believe that there could be evictions of another 40 or more families, because they learned that the Oakland Police Department is also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland, which could be involved in housing fraud.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: Po závodě zůstal Keselowski vedoucím Mistrovství světa jezdců s 2 250 body. Johnson je druhý s 2 243 body, tedy s rozdílem sedmi bodů. Na třetím místě je Hamlin, který ztrácí 20 bodů, ale s pěti body se umístil před Bowyerem. Kahne a Truex Jr. jsou na 5. a 6. místě s 2 220 a 2 207 body. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth a Harvick uzavírají prvních deset pozic v Mistrovství světa jezdců čtyři závody před koncem sezóny.
mt: 1. Keselowski 2. Johnson 3. Hamlin 4. Bowyer 5. Kahne 6. Truex Jr. 7. Stewart 8. Gordon 9. Kenseth 10. Harvick
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: Má se za to, že to bylo popáté v historii, kdy lidé zpozorovali něco, co se ukázalo jako chemicky potvrzený materiál z Marsu padající na Zemi. Z přibližně 24 000 známých meteoritů, které dopadly na Zemi, bylo jen asi u 34 ověřeno, že pocházejí z Marsu. Patnáct kamenných úlomků se přisuzuje meteorickému roji z července předchozího roku. Některé z hornin, které jsou na Zemi velmi vzácné, se prodávají za cenu od 11 000 do 22 500 USD za unci, což je asi desetkrát více než cena zlata.
mt: It is believed to be the sixth time people have observed something that turned out to be chemically verified Martian material falling to Earth. Of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites that have hit Earth, only about 34 have been confirmed to be from Mars. Fifteen stone fragments are attributed to a meteor shower in July of last year. Some of the minerals that are very rare on Earth are selling for prices ranging from $11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times the price of gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: Schumacher, který odešel do penze roku 2006 po sedminásobné výhře šampionátu Formule 1, měl nahradit zraněného Felipeho Massu. Brazilec utrpěl vážné poranění hlavy po havárii během Velké ceny Maďarska v roce 2009. Massa by měl být mimo hru minimálně po zbytek sezóny 2009.
mt: Schumacher, who retired in 2006 after seven Formula One championships, was to replace Felipe Massa, who suffered serious head injuries in a crash during the Hungarian Grand Prix in 2009. Massa is expected to be sidelined for the rest of the 2009 season.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.
