src: Až doposud se mohlo AOL pohybovat na trhu IM a vyvíjet ho vlastním tempem, a to díky jeho rozšířeném používání ve Spojených státech. Se vstupem této dohody v platnost může tato svoboda skončit. Počet uživatelů služeb Yahoo! a Microsoft dohromady bude konkurovat počtu zákazníků AOL.
mt: Until now, AOL could move on the IM market and develop it at its own pace, thanks to its widespread use in the United States. With this agreement in force, this freedom may end. The number of users of Yahoo! and Microsoft services together will compete with the number of AOL customers.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: Bomba ve voze, která explodovala poblíž policejního velitelství v tureckém Gaziantepu včera ráno, zabila dva policisty a zranila více než 20 dalších lidí. Úřad guvernéra uvedl, že devatenáct zraněných bylo policejními důstojníky. Policie uvedla, že ze spáchání útoku podezírá údajného bojovníka Islámského státu.
mt: A bomb in a car that exploded near a police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey, yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than 20 others. The governor's office said that 19 of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect a suspected Islamic State fighter of carrying out the attack.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Někdejší massachusettský guvernér Mitt Romney v úterý zvítězil v prezidentských primárkách Republikánské strany na Floridě, a to ziskem více než 46 % hlasů. Bývalý americký předseda Sněmovny reprezentantů Newt Gingrich byl na druhém místě s 32 procenty. Florida, jakožto stát, kde vítěz bere vše, přidělila všech padesát hlasů svých delegátů Romneymu, kterého tím posunula na pozici hlavního hráče o republikánskou nominaci.
mt: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Republican Party's presidential primaries in Florida on Tuesday, with more than 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. House Speaker Newt Gingrich was in second place with 32 percent. Florida, as a state where the winner takes all, awarded all 50 of its delegates to Romney, pushing him into the lead for the Republican nomination.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: Bývalý mluvčí Domu Newt Gingrich, texaský guvernér Rick Perry a kongresmanka Michele Bachmann skončili na čtvrtém, pátém a šestém místě. Po přijetí výsledků Gingrich pochválil Santoruma, tvrdá slova měl však pro Romneyho, kvůli kterému byly v Iowě spuštěny negativní reklamní kampaně vůči Gingrichovi. Perry prohlásil: „Vrátím se do Texasu, abych zhodnotil výsledky dnešního volebního shromáždění a rozhodl se, zda pro mě existuje nějaká možnost v tomto soutěžení dále pokračovat“, později však uvedl, že ve volebním soutěžení bude dále pokračovat a 21. ledna se zúčastní primárek v Jižní Karolíně. Bachmannová, vítězka srpnového nezávazného hlasování o republikánských kandidátech v Amesu, se rozhodla ukončit kampaň.
mt: Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas Governor Rick Perry and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth and sixth place. After the results were announced Gingrich praised Santorum, but had harsh words for Romney, who had launched negative advertising against Gingrich in Iowa. Perry said, "I will return to Texas to assess the results of today's caucus and decide whether there is any possibility for me to continue in this competition," later saying he would continue in the primary contest and participate in the South Carolina primary on January 21. Bachmann, the winner of the August non-binding straw poll in Ames, decided to end her campaign.
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: Webová stránka stanice popisuje pořad jako „oldschoolové divadlo s novým a nehorázným geeky elementem!“ Ve svých počátcích se pořad vysílal pouze na stránkách dlouho existujícího internetového rádia TogiNet, webu zaměřeného na rádio s mluveným slovem. Koncem roku 2015 TogiNet založil AstroNet Radio jakožto dceřinou stanici. V show původně účinkovali amatérští hlasoví herci – místní z Východního Texasu.
mt: The website describes the show as "old school theater with a new and outrageous geeky element!" In its early days, the show was broadcast only on the long-running internet radio station TogiNet, a website focused on radio with spoken word. At the end of 2015, TogiNet founded AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. In the show originally appeared amateur voice actors - local from East Texas.
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: Bombajští útočníci přijeli lodí 26. listopadu 2008 a přivezli s sebou granáty i automatické zbraně. Zaútočili na několik cílů včetně zaplněné železniční stanice Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus a slavného hotelu Taj Mahal. Průzkum a shromažďování informací o Davidu Headleym pomohlo uskutečnit operaci 10 ozbrojenců z pákistánské militantní skupiny Laskhar-e-Taiba. Útok vytvořil velký nápor na vzájemné vztahy mezi Indií a Pákistánem.
mt: 26 November 2008, the Mumbai attackers arrived by boat and brought with them grenades and automatic weapons. They attacked several targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Palace Hotel. Research and information gathering on David Headley helped to carry out the operation of 10 armed militants from the Pakistani militant group Lashkar-e-Taiba. The attack created a great strain on the relations between India and Pakistan.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: Nadalův rekord ze vzájemných utkání proti Kanaďanovi je 7–2. Nedávno prohrál s Raonicem v Brisbane Open. Nadal za zápas proměnil na síti 88 % bodů a 76 bodů získal na první podání. Král antuky po zápase prohlásil: „Jsem nadšený z toho, že jsem se vrátil zpět do finálových kol nejdůležitějších událostí. Jsem zde, abych se pokusil vyhrát.“
mt: Nadal's record against Raonic is 7–2. Recently lost to Raonic in Brisbane Open. Nadal won 88% of points on serve and 76 points won on first serve. King of clay after the match said: "I'm excited to be back in the final rounds of the most important events. I'm here to try to win."
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: Minulý týden společnost Naked News oznámila, že výrazně zvýší svůj mezinárodní jazykový mandát pro zpravodajství díky pomocí třech nových vysílacích relací. Kromě již existujícího zpravodajství v angličtině a japonštině spouští globální organizace španělské, italské a korejské jazykové programy pro televizi, web a mobilní zařízení.
mt: Last week, Naked News announced that it would significantly increase its international language mandate for news coverage by adding three new broadcasting relays. In addition to its existing news coverage in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian and Korean language programs for television, web and mobile devices.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: Kromě středeční akce Carpanedo soutěžil ve dvou jednotlivých závodech na šampionátu. Jejím prvním závodem byl slalom, kde první kolo nedokončila. 36 ze 116 soupeřek mělo v tomto závodu stejný výsledek. Ve svém dalším závodu, obřím slalomu, skončila v ženské skupině na desátém místě s celkovým časem 4:41,30, o 2:11,60 minut pomalejší než první Rakušanka Claudia Loesch a o 1: 09,02 minut pomalejší než devátá Gyöngyi Dani z Maďarska. Čtyři lyžařky v dámské skupině provozující lyžování vsedě nedokončily své jízdy a 45 z celkového počtu 117 lyžařů v obřím slalomu se nepodařilo v závodu umístit.
mt: Besides Wednesday's Carpanedo race, she also competed in two individual races at the championship. Its first race was a slalom, where she did not finish the first run. 36 of 116 competitors had the same result in this race. In her next race, the giant slalom, she finished in the women's group in tenth place with a total time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than the first Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than ninth Gyöngyi Dani from Hungary. Four skiers in the women's group practicing skiing sitting did not finish their runs and 45 of the total number of 117 skiers in the giant slalom did not manage to place in the race.
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: Ve středu pozastavila americká Národní basketbalová asociace svou profesionální basketbalovou sezonu kvůli obávám týkajícím se COVID-19. Rozhodnutí NBA padlo poté, co byl jeden z hráčů Utah Jazz pozitivně testován na onemocnění COVID-19.
mt: On Wednesday, the National Basketball Association suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision came after one of the Utah Jazz players tested positive for COVID-19.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: Dnešním hráčem dne je Alexandr Ovečkin z týmu Washington Capitals. Při vítězství Washingtonu nad Atlanta Trashers 5-3 zaznamenal 2 góly a 2 asistence. Ovečkinova první asistence večera byla při výherním gólu nováčka Nicklase Backstroma; jeho druhý gól večera byl jeho 60. gólem v sezóně, a stal se tak prvním hráčem, který vstřelil 60 a více gólů za sezónu od 1995-96, kdy tohoto milníku dosáhli Jaromír Jágr a Mario Lemieux.
mt: Today's player of the day is Alexander Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. In the Capitals' 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers, Ovechkin scored two goals and two assists. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal of rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th goal of the season, making him the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux accomplished the feat.
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

src: Banka Northern Rock byla znárodněna roku 2008 po odhalení toho, že společnost obdržela nouzovou podporu od britské vlády. Northern Rock požádal o podporu kvůli tomu, že roku 2007 utrpěl v krizi rizikových hypoték. Nabídka společnosti Virgin Group Sira Richarda Bransona pro banku byla před znárodněním banky zamítnuta. V roce 2010 byla dnešní retailová banka Northern Rock po znárodnění oddělena od „nezdravé“ části Northern Rock pro investiční management. Společnost Virgin koupila pouze „dobrou banku“ Northern Rock, nikoliv společnost spravující aktiva.
mt: Northern Rock was nationalised in 2008 after revealing it had received emergency support from the British government. Northern Rock asked for support because it suffered a crisis in risky mortgages in 2007. The offer from the Virgin Group's Sir Richard Branson for the bank was rejected before the bank was nationalised. In 2010, the current retail bank Northern Rock was separated from the "unhealthy" part of Northern Rock for investment management. The Virgin Group bought only the "good bank" Northern Rock, not the company managing assets.
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: Rozhodnutí pana Rudda podepsat Kjótský protokol o klimatu izoluje Spojené státy, které budou nyní jediným rozvinutým národem, který dohodu neratifikoval. Bývalá australská konzervativní vláda odmítla Kjótský protokol ratifikovat a prohlásila, že by poškodil ekonomiku se silnou závislostí na vývozu uhlí. Země jako Indie a Čína na druhou stranu nebyly emisními cíli vázány.
mt: Mr Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto Protocol isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to have ratified the agreement. The former conservative Australian government refused to ratify the Kyoto Protocol, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports. On the other hand, countries such as India and China were not bound by emissions targets.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: Střelci byli během studie doplňkové ochrany před škůdci pod přísným dohledem rangerů, jelikož studie byla monitorována a její účinnost vyhodnocována. Ve spolupráci NPSW a NSW Inc (Australská asociace sportovních střelců) byly najati kvalifikovaní dobrovolníci pod záštitou loveckého programu asociace. Podle Micka O'Flynna, úřadujícího ředitele v oblasti zachování přírodního dědictví agentury NPWS, obdrželi čtyři střelci, kteří byli vybrání pro první střelbu, komplexní bezpečnostní výcvik a trénink.
mt: The shooters were during the study supplementary protection against pests under strict ranger supervision, as the study was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In collaboration with NPSW and NSW Inc (Australian Association of Sporting Shooters) were hired qualified volunteers under the auspices of the hunting program of the association. According to Mick O'Flynn, the current director of the natural heritage conservation agency NPWS, four shooters who were selected for the first shooting, received comprehensive security training and training.
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: Na základě této fosilie můžeme prohlásit, že k tomuto oddělení došlo mnohem dříve, než se předpokládalo na základě molekulárních důkazů. To znamená, že všechno je třeba posunout dozadu,“ řekl výzkumník agentury Rift Valley Research Service v Etiopii a spoluautor studie Berhane Asfaw.
mt: Based on this fossil, we can say that this separation occurred much earlier than was previously thought based on molecular evidence. This means everything has to be pushed back, “said Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and co-author of the study Berhane Asfaw.
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: Při klíčové čtvrteční prezentaci na Tokyo Game Show odhalil prezident Nintendo Satoru Iwata design ovladače pro novou konzoli společnosti, Nintendo Revolution. Ovladač podobný televiznímu ovládání používá dva senzory umístěné poblíž uživatelovy televize, které triangulují jeho polohu v trojrozměrném prostoru. To umožní hráčům ovládat své akce a pohyby ve videohrách tím, že pohnou svým zařízením v prostoru.
mt: In a key Thursday presentation at Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo President Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller for the company's new console, Nintendo Revolution. The controller, similar to a television remote, uses two sensors placed near the user's television, which triangulate his position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control their actions and movements in video games by moving their device in space.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: Čínská novinářská agentura Xinhua dříve ohlásila, že má dojít k únosu letadla. Pozdější zprávy pak uvedly, že letadlo obdrželo bombovou hrozbu a bylo odvráceno zpět do Afghánistánu, kde přistálo v Kandaháru. První zprávy uvádějí, že letadlo bylo odkloněno zpět do Afghánistánu poté, co mu bylo zakázáno nouzové přistání v Urumči.
mt: Chinese news agency Xinhua earlier reported that the plane was hijacked. Later reports said the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, where it landed in Kandahar. Initial reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Urumqi.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: Sara Danius, stálá tajemnice Nobelovy komise pro literaturu na Švédské akademii, v pondělí skrze rádiový pořad na švédském Sveriges Radio veřejně oznámila, že po marné snaze přímo zkontaktovat Boba Dylana po jeho výhře Nobelovy ceny za literaturu v roce 2016 komise zanechává svých snah o jeho zkontaktování. Danius uvedl: „Právě teď neděláme nic. Volal jsem a posílal e-maily jeho nejbližšímu spolupracovníkovi a obdržel jsem velmi přátelské odpovědi. Prozatím to rozhodně stačí.“
mt: Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, announced publicly on Monday through a radio show on Swedish Radio that after a failed attempt to directly contact Bob Dylan after his win of the Nobel Prize in Literature in 2016, the committee is leaving its attempts to contact him. Danius said, "We're not doing anything right now. I called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly responses. For now, that's enough."
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: Americký prezident George W. Bush toto oznámení uvítal. Bushův mluvčí Gordon Johndroe nazval slib Severní Koreje „významným krokem k cíli dosažení ověřitelné denuklearizace Korejského poloostrova.“
mt: American President George W. Bush welcomed this announcement. Bush's spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a significant step toward the goal of verifiable denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula."
ref: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""

src: V roce 1956 se Słania přestěhoval do Švédska, kde o tři roky později zahájil práci pro Švédskou poštu a stal se jejím hlavním rytcem. Vyrobil více než 1 000 známek pro Švédsko a 28 dalších zemí. Kvalita a detaily jeho práce jsou natolik uznávány, že je jedním z mála „zavedených jmen“ mezi filatelisty. Někteří lidé se specializují jen na sbírání jeho práce. Jeho tisící známkou byla nádherná známka „Velké skutky švédských králů“ Davida Klöckera Ehrenstrahla z roku 2000, což je uvedeno v Guinnessově knize světových rekordů. Zabýval se také vytvářením rytin pro bankovky mnoha zemí, k nedávným příkladům jeho práce patří portréty premiérů na přední straně nových kanadských bankovek v hodnotě 5$ a 100$.
mt: In 1956, Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became its chief engraver. He produced more than 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. The quality and details of his work are so recognized that he is one of the few "established names" among philatelists. Some people specialize only in collecting his work. His thousandth stamp was the beautiful stamp "Great deeds of Swedish kings" of David Klöcker Ehrenstrahle in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He also created engravings for banknotes of many countries, to recent examples of his work are portraits of prime ministers on the front of new Canadian banknotes worth 5$ and 100$.
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: 800 mil Transaljašského potrubního systému bylo zavřeno v důsledku úniku tisíců barelů surové ropy jižně od města Fairbanks na Aljašce. Výpadek proudu po rutinní zkoušce požárního zabezpečovacího systému způsobil otevření pojistných ventilů a přetékání ropy poblíž čerpací stanice Fort Greely 9. Otevření ventilů umožnilo uvolnění tlaku systému a ropa vytekla na plošinu do nádrže, která pojme 55 000 barelů (2,3 milionu galonů). Ve středu odpoledne stále docházelo k úniku z ventilace nádrže, což bylo pravděpodobně způsobeno tepelnou expanzí uvnitř nádrže. Další sekundární zadržovací oblast pod nádržemi, schopná pojmout 104 500 barelů, nebyla dosud naplněna do své plné kapacity.
mt: 800 miles of Trans-Alaska Pipeline System was closed due to the release of thousands of barrels of raw crude oil south of the city of Fairbanks in Alaska. The pipeline pressure drop caused by routine fire protection system test opened relief valves and crude oil flowed out near the Fort Greely pumping station. The opening of the valves allowed the release of pressure in the system and the oil flowed into a containment basin that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). In the afternoon of Wednesday, the release from the containment basin was still ongoing, which was likely due to thermal expansion inside the basin. A secondary containment area under the basins, capable of holding 104,500 barrels, was not yet filled to its full capacity.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: Americký technický sbor odhaduje, že 15 cm dešťových srážek by mohlo vést k protržení již poškozených hrází. Ninth Ward, které bylo během hurikánu Katrina zaplaveno do výšky 20 stop, má nyní vody po pás dospělého člověka, protože blízká protipovodňová hráz přetekla. Přes hráz přetéká voda na úseku širokém 30 metrů.
mt: 15 cm of rain could cause levees to breach, according to the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers. The Ninth Ward, which was flooded up to 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, now has water up to the ankles of an adult, as a nearby levee has overtopped. Water is overtopping the levee in a 30 meter wide area.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Hamilton potvrdil, že nemocnice Howard University Hospital přijala pacienta ve stabilizovaném stavu. Pacient byl v Nigérii, kde se vyskytlo několik případů viru ebola. Nemocnice dodržovala protokol o kontrole infekcí, včetně separace pacientů za účelem zabránění možné nákazy ostatních.
mt: Hamilton confirmed that the Howard University Hospital received a patient in stable condition. The patient was in Nigeria, where several cases of the Ebola virus have been reported. The hospital followed infection control protocol, including separating patients to prevent possible infection of others.
ref: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.

src: Komety mohou být zdrojem dodávání vody na zemi spolu s organickou hmotou, která dokáže formovat bílkoviny a podporovat život. Vědci doufají, že pochopí, jak se utvářely planety, především toho, jak se utvářela Země od doby, kdy se před dávnou dobou srazily se Zemí komety.
mt: Comets may be a source of water delivery to Earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets formed, especially how Earth formed from the time when it collided with comets long ago.
ref: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

src: Zatímco autority nejsou o důvěryhodnosti hrozby přesvědčeny, Marylandský dopravní úřad provedl uzavření na naléhání FBI. Nákladní auta blokovala vjezd do tunelů a byla potřeba asistence 80 policistů k nasměrování řidičů na objízdné trasy. Na obchvatu, který pro město představuje alternativní trasu, nebyla hlášena žádná velká zpoždění v dopravě.
mt: While authorities are not convinced of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Department of Transportation closed the tunnels on the urging of the FBI. Trucks blocked the entrance to the tunnels and 80 police officers were needed to direct drivers onto detour routes. There were no major delays on the beltway, which serves as an alternate route for the city.
ref: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: Fotograf byl převezen do Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, kde následně zemřel. Údajně mu bylo něco přes 20 let. V prohlášení Bieber uvedl: „Ačkoliv jsem nebyl přítomen nebo přímo spojen s touto tragickou nehodou, na rodinu oběti myslím a modlím se za ně.“ Zábavný zpravodajský web TMZ uvádí, že fotograf zastavil s vozidlem na opačné straně ulice Sepulveda Boulevard a pokusil se fotografovat policejní hlídku, která prováděla silniční kontrolu. Poté přecházel na druhou stranu komunikace a policista kalifornské dopravní policie řídící dopravu jej dvakrát vyzval k návratu. Řidič vozidla, které zasáhlo fotografa, podle policie pravděpodobně nebude čelit obvinění z trestného činu.
mt: The photographer was taken to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he later died. He was reportedly in his early 20s. In a statement, Bieber said, "Although I was not present nor directly involved with this horrible incident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim, their friends and communities in your time of grief. I am not sure what the results of the investigation are but letting my fans down or letting them celebrate safely is my main concern." Entertainment news website TMZ reports that the photographer stopped his vehicle on the opposite side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of a police escort that was conducting a traffic stop. He then crossed the street and a California Highway Patrol officer directing traffic twice asked him to return. The driver of the vehicle that struck the photographer will not be charged with a crime, according to police.
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

src: "Prezident Rodrigo Arias uvedl, že Arias byl pozitivně testován na virus a jeho průběh je mírný. Stav prezidenta je stabilní, ale přesto zůstane několik dní v domácí izolaci. „Kromě horečky a bolesti v krku se cítím dobře a v kondici pro vykonávání své práce prostřednictvím telekomunikace. ""Očekávám návrat ke svým povinnostem v pondělí,"""" řekl Arias v prohlášení."""
mt: "President Rodrigo Arias said he tested positive for the virus and his course is mild. The president's condition is stable, but he will remain in home isolation for several days. "In addition to fever and sore throat, I feel well and in shape to perform my duties through telecommunications. "I expect to return to my duties on Monday,"" said Arias in a statement."
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

src: Tropická cyklóna Gonu, pojmenovaná po pytlu palmových listů v maledivštině, dosáhla na svém vrcholu stálé rychlosti větru 240 kilometrů za hodinu (149 mil za hodinu). K dnešnímu ránu vítr dosahoval rychlosti cca 83 km/h a očekávalo se, že bude slábnout.
mt: Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named after a coconut palm frond in Maldivian, reached its peak sustained wind speed of 240 kilometers per hour (149 mph). As of this morning, the wind speed was about 83 km/h and was expected to decrease.
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: Červený příliv je způsoben vyšší koncentrací Karenia brevis, přirozeně se vyskytujícího jednobuněčného mořského organismu. Potenciální kombinací přirozených faktorů mohou nastat ideální podmínky, díky nimž výskyt řas významně vzroste. Řasy vytvářejí neurotoxin, který může vyřadit nervy lidí i ryb. Ryby často hynou z důvodu vysokého obsahu toxinů ve vodě. Lidé mohou být postiženi vdechnutím dotčené vody, která se dostane do vzduchu větrem a vlnami.
mt: The red tide is caused by a higher concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally occurring single-celled marine organism. The potential combination of natural factors can create ideal conditions for a significant increase in the number of algae. Algae produce a neurotoxin that can paralyze the nerves of people and fish. Fish often die due to high toxin levels in the water. People can be affected by inhaling the affected water, which gets into the air by wind and waves.
ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: Felicia, dříve bouře kategorie 4 na Saffirově-Simpsonově hurikánové stupnici, zeslábla na tropickou tlakovou níži a v úterý se pak rozptýlila. Zbytky vyvolaly lijáky na celém území ostrovů, ale zatím bez zpráv o ničivých povodních. Srážky, dosahující 16,1 cm naměřených na Oahu, byly popsány jako „přínosné“. Některé z dešťů byly doprovázeny bouřemi a častými blesky.
mt: Felicia, formerly a Category 4 hurricane on the Saffir-Simpson hurricane scale, weakened to a tropical depression on Monday and then dissipated. The remnants triggered heavy rains across the islands, but no reports of damaging floods yet. Rainfall, reaching 16.1 cm measured on Oahu, were described as "beneficial". Some of the rains were accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning.
ref: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

src: Piquet Jr. havaroval při Velké ceně Singapuru v roce 2008 záhy poté, kdy musel Fernando Alonso zajet hned na začátku závodů do boxů, na trať pak vyjel safety car. Protože vozy nacházející se před Alonsem zajely do boxů dočerpat palivo po dobu safety caru na trati, posunul se před ně a závod vyhrál. Piquet junior byl po Velké ceně Maďarska v roce 2009 propuštěn.
mt: 2008 Singapore Grand Prix crash occurred shortly after Fernando Alonso had to pit at the start of the race, with the safety car deployed. As the cars ahead of Alonso pitted for fuel during the safety car period, he moved up to first place and won the race. Piquet Jr. was fired after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: Studie publikovaná ve čtvrtek v časopise Science popisuje vznik nových druhů ptáků na ekvádorských ostrovech Galapágy. Výzkumníci z Princetonské univerzity ve Spojených státech a Uppsala University ve Švédsku uvedli, že nové druhy se vyvinuly během pouhých dvou generací, i když se předpokládalo, že tento proces trvá mnohem déle, a to vzhledem k rozmnožování mezi endemickými pěnkavami, Darwinovými pěnkavami prostředními a  přistěhovaleckými pěnkavami kaktusovými a kuželozobými.
mt: A study published Thursday in the journal Science describes the emergence of new bird species on Ecuador's Galapagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden said the new species evolved in just two generations, although it was thought to take much longer, given the breeding between endemic finches, Darwin's medium finches and immigrant finches cactus and conical beaks.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: Studie publikovaná ve čtvrtek v časopise Science popisuje vznik nových druhů ptáků na ekvádorských ostrovech Galapágy. Výzkumníci z Princetonské univerzity ve Spojených státech a Uppsala University ve Švédsku uvedli, že nové druhy se vyvinuly během pouhých dvou generací, i když se předpokládalo, že tento proces trvá mnohem déle, a to vzhledem k rozmnožování mezi endemickými pěnkavami, Darwinovými pěnkavami prostředními a  přistěhovaleckými pěnkavami kaktusovými a kuželozobými.
mt: A study published Thursday in the journal Science describes the emergence of new bird species on Ecuador's Galapagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden said the new species evolved in just two generations, although it was thought to take much longer, given the breeding between endemic finches, Darwin's medium finches and immigrant finches cactus and conical beaks.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: Tato umělecká akce je také součástí kampaně radnice v Bukurešti, jež usiluje o obnovení obrazu rumunského hlavního města jako kreativní a barevné metropole. Ve městě se jako v prvním v jihovýchodní Evropě bude od června do srpna letošního roku konat CowParade, největší světová přehlídka umění.
mt: This artistic event is also part of a campaign by the city council of Bucharest, which is seeking to restore the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colorful metropolis. In the city, as the first in Southeast Europe, will be held from June to August this year CowParade, the largest world exhibition of art.
ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

src: Letadlo mířilo do Irkutsku a bylo provozováno jednotkami ministerstva vnitra. Za účelem prošetření bylo zahájeno pátrání. Letadlo Il-76 bylo významnou součástí ruské i sovětské armády od 70. let a minulý měsíc zažilo v Rusku vážnou nehodu. 7. října se motor oddělil během vzletu, ke zraněním nedošlo. Po této nehodě Rusko na krátkou dobu uzemnilo Il-76.
mt: The aircraft was en route to Irkutsk and was operated by units of the Ministry of Internal Affairs. A search was launched to investigate the incident. The Il-76 was a major part of the Russian and Soviet army since the 1970s and last month experienced a serious accident in Russia. On October 7, an engine separated during takeoff, with no injuries. Following this accident, Russia temporarily grounded Il-76s.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: Před Simpsonovými pracoval Simon na několika seriálech v různých pozicích. Během osmdesátých let pracoval na pořadech jako Taxi, Na zdraví nebo Show Tracey Ullmanové. V roce 1989 pomáhal s Brooksem a Groeningem vytvořit Simpsonovi a byl zodpovědný za přijetí prvního týmu scénáristů seriálu. Navzdory tomu, že seriál v roce 1993 opustil, si zachoval pozici výkonného producenta a nadále získával desítky milionů dolarů v licenčních poplatcích za každou sérii.
mt: Before working on The Simpsons, Simon worked on several other series in various positions. During the 1980s, he worked on Taxi, St. Elsewhere, and The Tracey Ullman Show. In 1989, he helped Brooks and Groening create The Simpsons and was responsible for hiring the first team of writers for the series. Despite leaving the series in 1993, he retained the position of executive producer and continued to earn tens of millions of dollars in licensing fees for each season.
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: Fluke napsala, že snahy některých lidí o umlčení žen v otázce ženského zdraví byly neúspěšné. K tomuto závěru došla díky množství pozitivních komentářů a povzbuzení, které ji zasílali ženy i muži a naléhali, aby byly antikoncepční léky považovány za medicínsky nezbytné.
mt: Fluke wrote that the efforts of some people to silence women on the issue of women's health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the large number of positive comments and encouragement she received from women and men, urging her to consider contraceptive drugs as medically necessary.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: „Bude se to chovat jako voda. Je to průhledné stejně jako voda. Pokud byste tedy stáli u břehu, viděli byste veškeré kamínky a kal ležící na dně. Pokud je nám známo, existuje pouze jediné těleso planetárního typu, které se vyznačuje větší dynamičností než Titan, a sice Země,“ dodal Stofan.
mt: "It will behave like water. It's transparent like water. So if you were standing on the shore, you would see all the pebbles and gravel lying on the bottom. If we know of any other planetary body that is more dynamic than Titan, it's Earth," Stofan added.
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

src: Tato skutečnost nejen potvrzuje, že přinejmenším někteří dinosauři měli peří (tato teorie je již rozšířená), ale také poskytuje podrobnosti, které fosílie obecně nemohou poskytnout, například o barevném a trojrozměrném uspořádání. Vědci tvrdí, že peří tohoto zvířete bylo kaštanově hnědé svrchu s bledou nebo karotenově zbarvenou spodní stranou. Objev také poskytuje náhled do problematiky vývoje peří u ptáků. Protože dinosauří peří nemá příliš vyvinutý osten, kterému se říká rachis, ale má jiné znaky - paprsky a háčky- výzkumníci usoudili, že rachis se pravděpodobně evolučně vyvinula později než tyto ostatní znaky. Struktura peří naznačuje, že nebyla používána za letu, ale spíše pro regulaci teploty nebo předvádění.  Vědci předpokládají, že i když se jedná o ocas mladého dinosaura, vzorek ukazuje dospělé peří a nikoliv mláděte. Vědci předpokládají, že i když se jedná o ocas mladého dinosaura, představuje vzorek opeření dospělého zvířete a nikoli prachové peří mláděte.
mt: This discovery not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers (this theory is already widespread), but also provides details that fossil remains generally cannot provide, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. Scientists say that the feathers of this animal were chestnut brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The discovery also provides insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaurian feathers have not yet developed a well-developed rachis, but have other features - barbs and barbules - researchers concluded that the rachis probably evolved later than these other features. The structure of the feathers suggests that it was not used for flight, but rather for temperature regulation or display. Researchers believe that although it is the tail of a young dinosaur, the specimen represents adult plumage and not downy feathers of a hatchling. Researchers believe that although it is the tail of a young dinosaur, the specimen represents adult plumage and not downy feathers of a hatchling.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Ačkoli se jedna experimentální vakcína jeví schopná snižovat smrtelnost eboly, až dosud nebyla u žádných léků jasně prokázána vhodnost k léčbě stávající infekce. Jeden koktejl protilátek, ZMapp, vypadal zpočátku slibně, ale formální studie naznačovaly, že měl v zabránění úmrtí menší užitek, než o jaký bylo usilováno. Při testu PALM sloužil produkt ZMapp jako kontrolní přípravek. Jinak řečeno, vědci jej použili jako výchozí bod pro porovnání tří dalších druhů léčby.
mt: Although one experimental vaccine appears to reduce ebola mortality, none of the drugs has yet been clearly shown to be effective in treating existing infections. One cocktail of antibodies, ZMapp, initially looked promising, but formal studies suggested it had less benefit in preventing death than was hoped for. In the PALM trial, ZMapp was used as a control treatment. In other words, researchers used it as a starting point for comparing three other types of treatment.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: V pondělí vědci z Lékařské fakulty Stanfordovy univerzity oznámili vynález nového diagnostického nástroje, který dokáže třídit buňky podle typu: malý vytisknutelný čip, který lze vyrobit pomocí standardních inkoustových tiskáren za cenu přibližně jednoho amerického centu za kus. Přední výzkumníci tvrdí, že to může umožnit včasné zjištění rakoviny, tuberkulózy, HIV a malárie pacientům v zemích s nízkým příjmem, kde jsou počty přeživších u chorob, jako je rakovina prsu, až o polovinu nižší oproti bohatším zemím.
mt: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a small printable chip that can be made using standard inkjet printers at a cost of about one American cent per piece. Leading researchers claim that it could enable early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where survival rates for diseases such as breast cancer are about half those in wealthier countries.
ref: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

src: Vědci také objevili pozemní útvary zvané laločnaté srázy, které jsou roztroušeny po celém povrchu měsíce a jsou zřejmě důsledkem jeho velmi pomalého smršťování. Tyto srázy lze nalézt po celém Měsíci a zdá se, že jsou jen minimálně poškozené, což značí, že geologické události zodpovědné za jejich vytvoření byly poměrně nedávné. Tato teorie je v rozporu s tvrzením, že na Měsíci není žádná geologická aktivita.
mt: Scientists also discovered landforms called lobate scarps, which are scattered across the moon's surface and are apparently the result of its very slow contraction. These scarps can be found all over the moon and seem to be only minimally damaged, indicating that the geological events responsible for their creation were relatively recent. This theory is in contrast to the claim that there is no geological activity on the moon.
ref: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

src: Adekoya byla poté Edinburghským šerifským soudem obviněna z vraždy svého syna. Čeká ve vazbě na obvinění a soudní proces, ale důkazy svědků mohou být znehodnoceny, protože její snímek byl široce publikován. Toto je běžnou praxí kdekoliv jinde v UK, ale skotská justice funguje jinak a soudy vnímaly publikaci fotografií jako potencionálně škodlivou. Profesorka Pamela Ferguson z University of Dundee poznamenává, že „novináři zřejmě chodí po tenkém ledě, pokud zveřejní fotografie aj. podezřelých.“ Prokuratura, která má trestní stíhání na starosti, dala novinářům najevo, že minimálně do vznesení obžaloby nebudou poskytnuty žádné další informace.
mt: Adekoya was then charged with murder by the Edinburgh Sheriff Court. She is awaiting trial and the evidence of witnesses may be compromised, as her image was widely published. This is a common practice anywhere else in the UK, but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed the publication of photographs as potentially harmful. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes that "journalists are walking on thin ice if they publish photographs of suspects." The prosecution, which is responsible for criminal proceedings, has made it clear that at least until charges are brought, no further information will be provided.
ref: "Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son. She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes ""journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."" Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment."

src: Kromě drtivého ledu se snahy o záchranu potýkaly i s extrémními klimatickými podmínkami. Pittman naznačil, že se podmínky nezlepší až do příštího týdne. Množství a tloušťka pole ledových ker byly podle Pittmana pro lovce tuleňů nejhorší za posledních 15 let.
mt: In addition to the crushing ice, the rescue efforts were also hampered by extreme weather conditions. Pittman indicated that the conditions would not improve until the next week. The amount and thickness of the ice pack were according to Pittman the worst for seal hunters in 15 years.
ref: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

src: Roberts rozhodně odmítl uvést, kdy podle něj začíná život – což je v etice potratů důležitá otázka – slovy, že komentovat specifika souvisejících případů by bylo neetické. Zopakoval nicméně své dřívější prohlášení, že případ Roe vs. Wade představoval „ustálenou judikaturu země“, čímž zdůraznil význam konzistentních výroků Nejvyššího soudu. Také potvrdil, že věří v nevyslovené právo na soukromí, na němž Roeho rozhodnutí záviselo.
mt: Roberts definitely refused to put when he thinks life begins – which is an important question in the ethics of abortion – by saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of cases. He reiterated, however, his previous statement that the Roe v. Wade case represented "settled law of the land", emphasizing the importance of consistent statements by the Supreme Court. He also confirmed that he believes in the unspoken right to privacy, on which the Roe decision depended.
ref: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."

src: Přesně v 8:46 hodin dopoledne zavládlo ve městě ticho, což byl přesně okamžik, kdy první tryskáč zasáhl svůj cíl. Dva paprsky světla byly nastaveny tak, aby pře noc směřovaly do nebe. Dále na pozemku probíhá výstavba pěti nových mrakodrapů spolu s dopravním centrem a památníkem uprostřed nich.
mt: 8:46 am precisely, the city fell silent, which was exactly the moment when the first jet hit its target. Two beams of light were set to point to the sky. Further on the site is under construction five new skyscrapers with a transportation center and a monument in the middle of them.
ref: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target. Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight. Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

src: Veškeré vchody do jeskyně, které dostaly název „Sedm sester“, mají minimálně100 až 250 metrů (328 až 820 stop) v průměru. Na infračervených fotkách je vidět, jak teplotní rozdíly mezi dnem a nocí ukazují, že jde pravděpodobně o jeskyně. „Ve dne jsou chladnější než okolní povrch a v noci naopak teplejší. Jejich tepelné změny nejsou tak stabilní jako v případě velkých jeskyní na Zemi, které často udržují poměrně konstantní teplotu, ale to je v souladu s tím, že jde o hluboké díry v zemi,“ řekl Glen Cushing z astrogeologického týmu agentury United States Geological Survey (USGS) a Univerzity Severní Arizony, která se nachází ve Flagstaffu.
mt: All entrances to the cave, which was named "Seven Sisters", have at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. On infrared images, temperature differences between day and night show that it is likely a cave. "During the day they are cooler than the surrounding surface and at night they are warmer. Their thermal changes are not as stable as in the case of large caves on Earth, which often maintain a relatively constant temperature, but this is in line with the fact that they are deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the astrogeological team of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and the University of Northern Arizona, which is located in Flagstaff.
ref: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."

src: Muž údajně najel tříkolovým vozidlem naplněným výbušninami přímo do davu. Muž podezíraný z odpálení bomby byl zadržen poté, co utrpěl zranění vlivem výbuchu. Jeho jméno je úřadům stále neznámé, přestože vědí, že je členem ujgurské etnické skupiny.
mt: A man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle filled with explosives directly into a crowd. A man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained after suffering injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.
ref: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.

src: Jihoafrická republika porazila tým All Blacks (Nový Zéland) v ragbyovém zápasu turnaje Tri Nations na stadionu Royal Bafokeng v Jihoafrické republice. Výsledné skóre bylo jednobodové vítězství 21 ku 20, což ukončilo herní sérii 15 vítězství All Blacks'. Pro Springboks tím skončila série proher trvající pět zápasů. Pro All Blacks, kteří již trofej vyhráli před dvěma týdny, to byl poslední zápas. Finální zápas série se odehraje příští týden v Ellis Park v Johannesburgu, kde budou hrát Springboks proti Austrálii.
mt: South Africa defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union match of the Tri Nations tournament at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' winning streak at 15. For the Springboks, this ended a five-game losing streak. For the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago, this was their last match. The final match of the series will be played next week in Ellis Park in Johannesburg, where the Springboks will play against Australia.
ref: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.

src: Stanice udržovala svou polohu až do konce výstupu do volného kosmického prostoru navzdory dřívější ztrátě gyroskopu během mise vesmírné stanice. Chiao a Šaripov hlásili, že jsou v bezpečné vzdálenosti od tlumičů nastavení polohy. Ruská pozemní kontrola aktivovala trysky a standardní postavení stanice bylo znovu aktivováno.
mt: The station maintained its position until the end of the ascent into free space despite an earlier loss of gyroscope during the mission. Chiao and Sharipov reported that they were in a safe distance from the attitude thrusters. Russian ground control activated the thrusters and the standard station position was reactivated.
ref: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.

src: Případ byl veden ve Virginii, jelikož je to domov hlavního poskytovatele internetové služby AOL, společnosti, která obvinění vznesla. Jedná se o první odsouzení za použití právních předpisů přijatých v roce 2003 k omezení hromadné pošty, neboli spamu, z nevyžádané distribuce do e-mailových schránek uživatelů.
mt: The case was brought in Virginia, as it is the home of the main provider of internet service AOL, the company that brought the charges. It is the first conviction under laws enacted in 2003 to limit bulk email, or spam, unsolicited distribution to email inboxes.
ref: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges. This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.

src: 28letý Vidal přišel do týmu Barcelony před třemi sezónami ze Sevilly. Od přestupu do katalánského hlavního města odehrál Vidal za klub 49 utkání.
mt: 28-year-old Vidal came to the Barcelona team before three seasons from Seville. Since the move to the Catalan capital, Vidal played for the club 49 games.
ref: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla. Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.

src: Jarque dříve toho dne trénoval při předsezónovém tréninku v Covercianu v Itálii. Před zápasem s Boloňou plánovaným na neděli bydlel v týmovém hotelu. Před zápasem s Boloňou plánovaným na neděli bydlel spolu s týmem v hotelu.
mt: Jarque had earlier trained in Coverciano, Italy, on the day of the incident. He was staying in the team hotel before the match against Bologna on Sunday.
ref: Jarque was practicing during pre-season training at Coverciano in Italy earlier in the day. He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia. He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia.

src: Nebylo vydáno žádné varování před tsunami a podle geofyzikální agentury v Jakartě ani žádné vydáno nebude, protože otřesy nedosáhly vyžadované intenzity 6,5 stupňů. Navzdory tomu, že neexistovala hrozba tsunami, začali obyvatelé panikařit a opouštět své obchody a domovy.
mt: No tsunami warning was issued and according to the geophysical agency in Jakarta, none will be issued, as the tremors did not reach the required intensity of 6.5 degrees. Despite the fact that there was no tsunami threat, people began panicking and leaving their shops and homes.
ref: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement. Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.

src: Zjistili, že Slunce funguje na stejném základním principu jako jiné hvězdy: aktivita všech hvězd v systému je zjevně určována jejich světelností, rotací a ničím jiným. Na základě svítivosti a rotace se určuje Rossbyho číslo hvězdy, které souvisí s tokem plazmatu. Čím je Rossbyho číslo menší, tím méně aktivní je hvězda z hlediska magnetického obratu.
mt: They found that the Sun works on the same basic principle as other stars: the activity of all stars in the system is apparently determined by their luminosity, rotation, and nothing else. Based on luminosity and rotation, the Rossby number of a star is determined, which is related to the flow of plasma. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star is in terms of magnetic rotation.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else. The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Průzkum veřejného mínění provedený u 1 400 lidí před federálními volbami v roce 2010 ukázal, že počet lidí, kteří nesouhlasí v přeměnu Austrálie na republiku, stoupl oproti roku 2008 o 8 procent. Předsedkyně úřednické vlády Julia Gillard během kampaně ve federálních volbách 2010 prohlásila, že věří, že by se na konci vlády královny Alžběty II. měla Austrálie stát republikou. 34 procent účastníků průzkumu sdílí tento názor a chtějí, aby královna Alžběta II. byla posledním monarchou Austrálie. Co se týče krajních názorů v rámci průzkumu, je 29 procent dotázaných přesvědčeno, že Austrálie by se měla stát republikou co nejdříve, a 31 procent si myslí, že Austrálie by se republikou neměla stát nikdy.
mt: 2010 federal election opinion poll showed that the number of people who disagree with the transformation of Australia into a republic increased by 8 percent compared to 2008. Prime Minister Julia Gillard during the 2010 federal election campaign said she believed that Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 percent of the poll respondents share this view and want Queen Elizabeth II to be the last monarch of Australia. As for the extreme views in the poll, 29 percent of respondents are convinced that Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, and 31 percent think Australia should never become a republic.
ref: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.

src: Průzkum veřejného mínění provedený u 1 400 lidí před federálními volbami v roce 2010 ukázal, že počet lidí, kteří nesouhlasí v přeměnu Austrálie na republiku, stoupl oproti roku 2008 o 8 procent. Předsedkyně úřednické vlády Julia Gillard během kampaně ve federálních volbách 2010 prohlásila, že věří, že by se na konci vlády královny Alžběty II. měla Austrálie stát republikou. 34 procent účastníků průzkumu sdílí tento názor a chtějí, aby královna Alžběta II. byla posledním monarchou Austrálie. Co se týče krajních názorů v rámci průzkumu, je 29 procent dotázaných přesvědčeno, že Austrálie by se měla stát republikou co nejdříve, a 31 procent si myslí, že Austrálie by se republikou neměla stát nikdy.
mt: 2010 federal election opinion poll showed that the number of people who disagree with the transformation of Australia into a republic increased by 8 percent compared to 2008. Prime Minister Julia Gillard during the 2010 federal election campaign said she believed that Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 percent of the poll respondents share this view and want Queen Elizabeth II to be the last monarch of Australia. As for the extreme views in the poll, 29 percent of respondents are convinced that Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, and 31 percent think Australia should never become a republic.
ref: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.

src: Mluvčí Nadace Komen Leslie Aun říká, že organizace přijala nové pravidlo, které neumožňuje udělení grantů nebo financování organizacím, které jsou předmětem právního šetření. Politika nadace Komen označila organizaci Planned Parenthood za nezpůsobilou pro financování kvůli probíhajícímu vyšetřování, které řeší, jak organizace utrácí a vykazuje své peníze. Vyšetřování provádí zástupce Cliff Stearns. Stearns ve své roli předsedy Podkomise pro dohled a šetření pod záštitou Komise pro domácí energie a obchodní styky vyšetřuje, zda jsou daně používány k financování potratů v rámci Plánovaného rodičovství.
mt: Leslie Aun, spokeswoman for the Susan G. Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new policy that prohibits grants or funding to organizations that are under investigation. The Komen Foundation policy labeled Planned Parenthood as ineligible for funding due to an ongoing investigation into how the organization spends and reports its money. The investigation is being conducted by Rep. Cliff Stearns. Stearns, in his role as chairman of the Subcommittee on Oversight and Investigations under the Committee on Energy and Commerce, is investigating whether taxes are being used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood.
ref: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.

src: Policie v Madhya Pradesh získala zpět ukradený notebook a mobilní telefon. Zástupce policejního ředitele D. K. Arya řekl: „Zadrželi jsme pět osob, které znásilnily ženu ze Švýcarska, a u zadržených jsme zajistili mobilní telefon a přenosný počítač patřící poškozené.“ Obvinění se jmenují Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar a Vishnu Kanjar. Policejní ředitel Chandra Shekhar Solanki řekl, že se obvinění dostavili k soudu se zakrytými tvářemi.
mt: Police in Madhya Pradesh recovered a stolen laptop and mobile phone. Deputy police commissioner D. K. Arya said, "We have arrested five persons who raped a Swiss woman and seized the mobile phone and laptop belonging to the victim." The accused are named Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police chief Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with their faces covered.
ref: "The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, ""We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop"". The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces."

src: ASUS Eee PC, dříve celosvětově uvedený na trh kvůli úspoře a funkčnosti, se stal žhavým tématem na Měsíci informatiky v Tajpeji v roce 2007. Spotřebitelský trh s přenosnými počítači se však radikálně otřese a promění poté, co byl ASUS v roce 2007 oceněn cenou Taiwan Sustainable Award od premiéra vlády Čínské republiky.
mt: The ASUS Eee PC, previously launched worldwide for its savings and functionality, became a hot topic at the Taipei Computer Show in 2007. The consumer market for portable computers will be shaken and changed after ASUS was awarded the Taiwan Sustainable Award from the Premier of the Republic of China in 2007.
ref: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month. But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.

src: Problém začal 1. ledna, kdy si desítky místních obyvatel začaly stěžovat obanazawské poště, že neobdržely svá tradiční a pravidelná novoroční přání. Pošta včera vydala oficiální omluvu občanům a médiím poté, co zjistila, že chlapec ukryl více než 600 poštovních dokumentů, z toho 429 novoročních přání, které příslušným adresátům nebyly doručeny.
mt: The problem began on January 1, when dozens of local residents began complaining to the Obanazawa post office that they had not received their traditional and regular New Year's greetings. The post office issued an official apology to citizens and the media yesterday after it was discovered that a boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year's greetings, which were not delivered to the intended recipients.
ref: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards. Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.

src: Murray prohrál první set v tie breaku poté, co si oba hráči v tomto setu udrželi své podání. Del Potro získal výhodu ve druhém setu, ale i tak došlo k tie-breaku po dosažení skóre 6-6. Potro v tuto chvíli potřeboval rameno ošetřit, ale podařilo se mu vrátit se do hry.
mt: Murray lost the first set in a tiebreak after both players held their serve. Del Potro took the second set advantage, but it was still a tiebreak after reaching 6-6. Potro needed to have his arm taped, but managed to return to the game.
ref: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set. Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.
