src: V doprovodu těchto zástupců ujistil občany Texasu, že jsou podnikány kroky za účelem ochránění veřejné bezpečnosti. Perry konkrétně řekl: „Na světě je jen málo míst lépe vybavených k tomu, aby reagovaly na předloženou výzvu.“ Guvernér také uvedl: „Dnes jsme se dozvěděli, že některé děti školního věku byly v kontaktu s pacientem.“ Potom řekl: „Tento případ je vážný. Můžete se spolehnout, že náš systém funguje tak dobře, jak by měl.“
mt: In the company of these representatives, Perry assured Texans that steps are being taken to protect public safety. Perry specifically said, "There are few places better equipped to respond to this call." The governor also said, "Today we learned that some school-aged children were in contact with the patient." He then said, "This case is serious. You can be assured that our system is working as well as it should."
ref: "Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically said, ""There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."" The governor also stated, ""Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."" He went on to say, ""This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."""

src: Dlouho před The Daily Show a The Colbert Report si Heck a Johnson vymysleli publikaci, která by parodovala zprávy – a zpravodajství –, ještě když byli studenti na UW v roce 1988. Od svého počátku se The Onion stala uznávaným impériem novinářské parodie včetně tištěné edice, webové stránky s 5 000 000 jednotlivými návštěvníky jen za říjen, personalizované reklamy, 24hodinové zpravodajské sítě, podcastů a nedávno uvedeného atlasu světa nazvaného Náš hloupý svět. Al Gore a generál Tommy Franks si porovnávají své nejoblíbenější články (Gorův je ten, v němž The Onion uvádí, že si se svou ženou Tipper užili nejlepší sex svého života po prohraných volbách v roce 2000). Mnoho jejich pisatelů značně ovlivnilo parodické novinářské pořady Jona Stewarta a Stephena Colberta.
mt: Heck and Johnson had long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report invented a publication that would parody the news—and the news media—when they were students at UW in 1988. From its inception, The Onion has become an established empire of journalistic parody including a print edition, a website with 5 million individual visitors in October alone, personalized ads, 24-hour news network, podcasts, and a recently released atlas of the world called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks compare their favorite articles (Gore's is the one in which The Onion reports that he and his wife Tipper had the best sex of their lives after losing the 2000 election). Many of their writers have greatly influenced the parodic news programs of Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert.
ref: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.

src: Protest začal kolem 11:00 h místního času (UTC +1) na ulici Whitehall naproti vjezdu do oficiálního sídla předsedy vlády v Downing Street střeženému policií. Krátce po 11. hodině zablokovali protestující ve Whitehallu provoz silnice směřující na sever. V 11:20 policie požádala protestující, aby se přesunuli zpátky na chodník, s odůvodněním, že potřebují nastolit rovnováhu mezi právem demonstrovat a narůstajícím provozem. Kolem 11:29 se protest přesunul po Whitehallu kolem Trafalgar Square, podél Strand, kolem Aldwychu a na Kingsway směrem k Holbornu, kde Konzervativní strana pořádala jarní fórum v hotelu Grand Connaught Rooms.
mt: The protest began at around 11:00 am local time (UTC +1) on Whitehall opposite the official residence of the Prime Minister in Downing Street guarded by police. Shortly after 11:00 the protesters blocked the Whitehall traffic leading north. At 11:20 police asked the protesters to return to the pavement, citing the need to establish a balance between the right to protest and increasing traffic. Around 11:29 the protest moved along Whitehall around Trafalgar Square, along Strand, around Aldwych and on Kingsway towards Holborn, where the Conservative Party was holding a spring forum at the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.
ref: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence. Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall. At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up. Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.

src: „Nyní máme čtyřměsíční myši bez cukrovky, které ji dříve měly,“ dodal. Dr. Ehud Ur, profesor medicíny na Dalhousieově univerzitě v Halifaxu v Novém Skotsku a zároveň předseda klinické a vědecké divize Kanadské diabetické asociace upozornil, že výzkum je teprve ve svých počátcích. Stejně jako někteří další experti je skeptický ohledně toho, zda je možné diabetes vyléčit. Poukazuje na to, že tato zjištění se netýkají lidí, kteří již mají diabetes 1. typu.
mt: "Now we have four-month-old mice without diabetes that had it before," he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and chairman of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association, noted that the research is still in its infancy. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured. He points out that these findings do not apply to people who already have type 1 diabetes.
ref: """We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic,"" he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes."

Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes."

src: Twin Otter se včera pokusil přistát na Kokodě v rámci letu CG4684 společnosti PNG, ale jednou již přistání zrušil. Asi deset minut před tím, než měl proběhnout druhý pokus o přistání, letadlo zmizelo. Místo havárie bylo dnes lokalizováno a je tak nedostupné, že dva policisté museli být vysazeni v džungli, aby se vydali k havarovanému letadlu pěšky a hledali přeživší. Pátrácí akci bránilo stejně špatné počasí, které způsobilo zrušené přistání.
mt: Yesterday, a Twin Otter attempted to land at Kokoda as part of flight CG4684 operated by PNG, but once cancelled the landing. About ten minutes before the second attempt at landing, the aircraft disappeared. The crash site was located today and is thus inaccessible, that two police officers had to be parachuted into the jungle to walk to the crashed aircraft and search for survivors. The search was hampered by the same bad weather, which caused the landing to be cancelled.
ref: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already. About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared. The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors. The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.

src: „Naštěstí se mi nic nestalo, ale viděl jsem děsivý výjev toho, jak se lidé snažili rozbíjet okna ve snaze dostat se ven. Lidé do tabulí tloukli židlemi, ale okna byla nerozbitná. Jedna z tabulek se konečně rozbila a lidé začali vylézat oknem,“ řekl přeživší Franciszek Kowal.
mt: "Fortunately, I was not hurt, but I saw a terrifying sight of people trying to break the windows in order to get out. People were hitting the tables with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable. One of the tables finally broke and people started climbing out the window," said survivor Franciszek Kowal.
ref: """Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out. People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable. One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window,"" said survivor Franciszek Kowal."

src: Ve východním Atlantském oceánu se utvořila tropická bouře Danielle, čtvrtá pojmenovaná bouře sezóny atlantických hurikánů 2010. Bouře odehrávající se zhruba 3 000 mil od Miami na Floridě má maximální stálou rychlost větru 40 mil/h (64 km/h). Vědci z Národního centra pro hurikány předpokládají, že Danielle do středy zesílí na rychlost hurikánu. Vzhledem k tomu, že se bouře nachází daleko od pobřeží, je nadále obtížné posoudit její možný dopad na Spojené státy nebo Karibik.
mt: In the eastern Atlantic Ocean, a tropical storm named Danielle, the fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, formed. Danielle, which is about 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has a maximum sustained wind speed of 40 mph (64 km/h). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center expect Danielle to strengthen to hurricane status by Wednesday. Because the storm is far from land, it is difficult to assess its potential impact on the United States or the Caribbean.
ref: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday. As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.

src: Doktor Lee také vyjádřil obavy nad zprávami, že se děti v Turecku nyní nakazí virem ptačí chřipky A(H5N1), aniž by onemocněly. Poznamenal, že některé studie naznačují, že se nemoc musí stát méně smrtelnou, aby mohla způsobit globální epidemii. Existuje obava, že pokud příznaky chřipky zůstanou mírné, pacienti nakazí ještě více lidí během svých každodenních činností.
mt: Dr. Lee also expressed concern over reports that children in Turkey are now contracting the avian flu virus A(H5N1) without becoming ill. He noted that some studies suggest that the disease must become less deadly in order to cause a global epidemic. There is concern that if the flu symptoms remain mild, patients will infect even more people during their daily activities.
ref: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill. Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted. There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.

src: V noci na 9. srpna bylo oko tajfunu Morakot vzdáleno asi 70 kilometrů od čínské provincie Fu-ťien. Předpokládá se, že tajfun se pohybuje směrem k Číně rychlostí 11 km/h.
mt: 9 August night was the eye of the typhoon Morakot about 70 kilometers from the Chinese province of Fujian. It is assumed that the typhoon is moving towards China at a speed of 11 km/h.
ref: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian. The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.

src: Americký prezident George W. Bush dorazil do Singapuru ráno 16. listopadu a zahájil týdenní cestu po Asii. Byl přivítán singapurským místopředsedou vlády Wong Kan Sengem a se singapurským premiérem Lee Hsien Loongem diskutoval otázky obchodu a terorismu. Po ztrátovém týdnu při pololetních volbách Bush informoval publikum o rozšíření trhu v Asii.
mt: 16 November 2006: US President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore early this morning and began a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a losing week in the mid-term elections, Bush told the audience about the expansion of the market in Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Dnešní oznámení také prodloužilo závazek vlády učiněný v březnu tohoto roku financovat další vozy. S dalšími 300 je to celkově 1 300 povozů potřebných ke zmírnění přelidnění.
mt: Today's announcement also extended the government's March commitment to fund additional vehicles. With another 300, it's a total of 1,300 vehicles needed to ease overcrowding.
ref: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.

src: Řekla, že „nejsou žádné zprávy, které by naznačovaly bezprostředně očekávaný útok. Snížení úrovně stavu ohrožení na závažný však neznamená, že hrozba jako taková zmizela.“
mt: She said, "There are no reports that would indicate an imminent attack. However, the lowering of the threat level to severe does not mean that the threat itself has disappeared."
ref: "She said, ""There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently. However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."""

src: Martelly včera přísahal v devítičlenné Prozatímní volební radě (CEP). Je to Martellyho pátá CEP za čtyři roky. Minulý měsíc doporučila prezidentská komise rezignaci předešlého CEP jakožto součást opatření sloužících k tomu, aby se země posunula k novým volbám. Komise představovala Martellyho reakci na mohutné protivládní protesty, které začaly v říjnu. Tyto někdy násilné protesty byly vyvolány nezdarem při pořádání voleb a některé probíhají od roku 2011.
mt: Martelly yesterday swore in a nine-member Provisional Electoral Council (CEP). It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month, the presidential commission recommended the resignation of the previous CEP as part of measures to move the country toward new elections. The commission represented Martelly's response to the massive anti-government protests that began in October. These sometimes violent protests were sparked by the failure to hold elections and some have been ongoing since 2011.
ref: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

src: USA Gymnastics podporuje dopis Olympijské komisi Spojených států a uznává naprostou potřebu Olympijské rodiny propagovat bezpečné prostředí pro všechny naše atlety. Souhlasíme s prohlášením Olympijského výboru Spojených států amerických, že zájmy našich sportovců, jejich oddílů a samotných sportů budou lépe chráněny, pokud podpoříme smysluplné změny v rámci naší organizace, a nikoli pokud organizace ztratí oficiální pravomoci. Gymnastický výbor USA podporuje nezávislé vyšetřování, které by pomohlo osvětlit, jak mohlo tak rozsáhlé obtěžování, jež oběti Larryho Nassara tak statečně popisovaly, zůstat tak dlouhou dobu bez povšimnutí. Dále také vítá veškeré potřebné změny. USA Gymnastics a USOC mají stejný cíl – aby byla gymnastika a další sporty co nejbezpečnější pro sportovce, aby mohli jít za svým snem v bezpečném, pozitivním a vstřícném prostředí.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports the letter from the United States Olympic Committee and recognizes the absolute necessity of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all our athletes. We agree with the statement of the United States Olympic Committee that the interests of our athletes, their clubs and the sports themselves will be better served if we support meaningful changes within our organization, not if the organization loses its official authority. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that would help shed light on how such widespread abuse, as the victims of Larry Nassar so bravely described, could have gone unnoticed for so long. We also welcome all necessary changes. USA Gymnastics and USOC have the same goal – to make gymnastics and other sports as safe as possible for athletes to pursue their dreams in a safe, positive and welcoming environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Americké námořnictvo také uvedlo, že nehodu prošetřuje. V prohlášení také uvedli: „Posádka momentálně pracuje na určení optimální metody pro bezpečné vyzvednutí lodi.“ Minolovka třídy Avenger byla na cestě do Puerto Princesa v Palawanu. Byla přidělena sedmé flotile amerického námořnictva a sídlí v japonském Sasebu v Nagasaki.
mt: The U.S. Navy also said it is investigating the incident. In a statement, they also said: "The crew is currently working to determine the best method for a safe recovery of the vessel." The minesweeper of the Avenger class was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It was assigned to the Seventh Fleet of the U.S. Navy and is based in Sasebu in Nagasaki, Japan.
ref: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."

src: V neděli pak prezident Spojených států Donald Trump v prohlášení vydaném přes tiskového mluvčího oznámil, že se americká vojska stáhnou ze Sýrie. K oznámení došlo poté, co měl Trump telefonický hovor s tureckým prezidentem Recepem Tayyipem Erdoğanem. Turecko také převezme ostrahu zajatých bojovníků ISIS, které dle prohlášení odmítly evropské národy repatriovat.
mt: On Sunday, U.S. President Donald Trump announced in a statement released through a press spokesman that U.S. forces will withdraw from Syria. The announcement came after Trump had a phone call with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey will also take over the security of ISIS fighters, which according to the statement European countries refused to repatriate.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Koaliční a afghánská vojska se přesunula do oblasti za účelem zabezpečení místa a další koaliční letectvo bylo vysláno za účelem asistence. Ke kolizi došlo vysoko v horském terénu a předpokládá se, že byla výsledkem nepřátelské palby. Snahy prohledat místo dopadu se potýkají s nepříznivým počasím a náročným terénem.
mt: Coalition and Afghan forces have moved into the area to secure the site and further coalition aircraft have been dispatched to assist. The crash occurred high in mountainous terrain and is believed to be the result of hostile fire. Efforts to search the crash site are hampered by inclement weather and difficult terrain.
ref: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire. Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.

src: Po postavení přehrady v roce 1963 došlo k zastavení sezónních povodní, které by rozšířily sediment po řece. Tyto usazeniny byly nezbytné pro vytvoření písčin a pláží, které sloužily jako přírodní stanoviště pro volně žijící živočichy. V důsledku toho vyhynuly dva druhy ryb a další dva včetně gily arizonské jsou nyní v ohrožení. Ačkoliv hladina vody stoupne po záplavě jen o několik stop, úředníci doufají, že to postačí na obnovu erodovaných písčin níže po proudu.
mt: After the dam was built in 1963, seasonal floods were halted, which would have spread sediment along the river. These deposits were necessary for the creation of sandbars and beaches, which served as natural habitats for wild animals. As a result, two species of fish went extinct, and two others including the gila Arizona are now endangered. Although the water level rises after a flood only a few inches, officials hope that will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.
ref: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.

src: Ambasáda Spojených států v keňském Nairobi vydala varování, že „extrémisté ze Somálska“ plánují v Keni a Etiopii zahájit sebevražedné bombové útoky. Spojené státy uvádějí, že obdržely informaci od nejmenovaného zdroje, který specificky zmiňuje použití sebevražedných bombových atentátníků ke zničení „důležitých míst“ v Etiopii a Keni.
mt: The United States Embassy in Nairobi, Kenya, issued a warning that "extremists from Somalia" are planning suicide bombings in Kenya and Ethiopia. The United States states that they received information from an unnamed source, specifically mentioning the use of suicide bombers to destroy "important places" in Ethiopia and Kenya.
ref: "The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that ""extremists from Somalia"" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up ""prominent landmarks"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."

src: Slavní řečtí právníci Sakis Kechagioglou a George Nikolakopoulos byli uvězněni v athénském vězení Korydallus poté, co byli shledáni vinnými z úplatkářství a korupce. Výsledkem byl velký skandál v řecké právní komunitě, který byl prohlouben objevením nelegálních aktivit, které v předchozích letech činili soudci, právníci a advokáti . Před pár týdny a poté, co tuto informaci zveřejnil žurnalista Makis Triantafylopoulos ve svém populárním televizním pořadu „Zoungla“ na Alpha TV, byl člen Parlamentu a právník Petros Mantouvalos abdikován kvůli tomu, že se členové jeho úřadu podíleli na ilegálních úplatcích a korupci. Navíc je nejvyšší soudce Evangelos Kalousis ve vězení, protože byl shledán vinným z korupce a zvrhlého chování.
mt: Famous Greek lawyers Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos were imprisoned in the Athens prison Korydallus after being found guilty of bribery and corruption. The result was a big scandal in the Greek legal community, which was deepened by the discovery of illegal activities that judges, lawyers and advocates had been doing in the previous years. A few weeks ago, after this information was revealed by journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular television show "Zoungla" on Alpha TV, Member of Parliament and lawyer Petros Mantouvalos was forced to resign because members of his office were involved in illegal bribes and corruption. Moreover, the highest judge Evangelos Kalousis is in prison, because he was found guilty of corruption and depraved behavior.
ref: "The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption. As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years. A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show ""Zoungla"" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour."

src: Robin Uthappa dosáhl nejvyššího skóre za směnu, kdy za 70 výpadů při pouhých 41 míčích hodil 11 čtyřek a 2 šestky. Střední odpalovači Sachin Tendulkar a Rahul Dravid si vedli dobře a uzavřeli stotisícové partnerství. Po ztrátě branky kapitána však Indie získala pouze 36 bodů a ztratila 7 branek, čímž ukončila směnu.
mt: Robin Uthappa scored the highest score for the innings, when in 70 hits with only 41 balls he hit 11 fours and 2 sixes. The middle hitters Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid did well and closed the hundred partnership. After the loss of the captain's wicket, however, India gained only 36 points and lost 7 goals, thus ending the innings.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership. But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Správce Commons Adam Cuerden vyjádřil svou frustraci nad smazánými daty v rozhovoru pro Wikinews z minulého měsíce. „On [Wales] nám v podstatě lhal od začátku. Zaprvé tím, že jednal, jako by to bylo z právních důvodů. Zadruhé předstíráním, že nás poslouchá, až do smazání děl.“ Rozhořčení komunity vedlo k současnému úsilí o přípravu pravidel týkajících se sexuálního obsahu pro webovou stránku, která obsahuje miliony médií s otevřenou licencí.
mt: Commons administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deleted data in an interview with Wikinews last month. "He [Wales] was basically lying to us from the start. First, by acting as if it was a legal matter. Second, by pretending to listen to us, until the deletion happened." Community frustration led to the current effort to prepare rules regarding sexual content for the website, which contains millions of media with open licenses.
ref: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. ""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."" The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."

src: Ne všichni byli příznivci zařazení ženských kategorií. Stříbrný medailista olympijských her v roce 2014 Amir Khan řekl: „V hloubi duše si myslím, že by ženy bojovat neměly. To je můj názor.“ Navzdory vyřčeným komentářům bude na Olympijských hrách 2012 v Londýně podporovat britské soutěžící.
mt: Not all were supporters of the inclusion of women's categories. Silver medalist at the 2014 Olympics Amir Khan said: "In my heart I think women should not fight. That's my opinion." Despite the expressed comments will support British competitors at the 2012 Olympics in London.
ref: "Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks. 2004 Olympic silver medallist Amir Khan said, ""Deep down I think women shouldn’t fight. That’s my opinion."" Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London."

src: Třináctiletý motocyklový závodník Peter Lenz zemřel po nehodě na okruhu Indianapolis Motor Speedway. Během zahřívacího kola spadl Lenz ze své motorky a byl sražen dalším závodníkem Xavierem Zayatem. Okamžitě mu přispěchali na pomoc traťoví zdravotníci a byl transportován do místní nemocnice, kde později zemřel. Zayat nebyl při nehodě zraněn.
mt: 13-year-old motorcycle racer Peter Lenz died after a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. During the warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his motorcycle and was hit by another racer, Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by trackside medical personnel and was transported to a local hospital, where he later died. Zayat was not injured in the crash.
ref: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was unhurt in the accident.

src: Cestování letadlem může být děsivé pro osoby každého věku a původu, obzvlášť pokud se jedná o jejich první let, případně pokud mají za sebou nějakou traumatickou zkušenost. Není to něco, za co by bylo potřeba se stydět: není to nijak odlišné od osobních obav a averzí vůči jiným věcem, jaké má velmi mnoho lidí. Některým lidem může pochopení, jak fungují letadla a co se děje během letu, pomoci překonat strach z neznáma nebo z pocitu, že situace není pod kontrolou.
mt: Flying can be scary for people of all ages and backgrounds, especially if it's their first flight, or if they've had a traumatic experience. It's not something to be ashamed of: it's no different from personal fears and aversions to other things, which many people have. Understanding how airplanes work and what happens during a flight can help overcome fear of the unknown or the feeling of being out of control.
ref: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have. For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.

src: V dnešní době se cesta letadlem jen zřídka rezervuje přímo u aerolinek, aniž by člověk trochu hledal a porovnal si ceny. Ten samý let může být u různých prodejců pořízen s propastnými rozdíly v ceně. Před provedením rezervace se tedy vyplatí porovnat výsledky vyhledávání a podívat se také na webové stránky samotné letecké společnosti.
mt: In today's world, a flight is rarely booked directly with an airline without a little searching and comparing prices. The same flight can be purchased from different sellers with vast differences in price. Before making a reservation, it is worth comparing the results of the search and also looking at the website of the airline itself.
ref: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.

src: Zásilkové společnosti jsou dobře placeny za rychlé doručení zboží. Čas je často velmi důležitým faktorem u obchodních dokumentů, zboží nebo náhradních dílů pro naléhavou opravu. Na některých trasách mají větší společnosti vlastní letadla, u jiných tras a menších firem však nastal problém. Pokud by věci poslali leteckou nákladní dopravou, pak by na některých trasách mohlo trvat několik dnů, než by věci prošly vykládkou a celní kontrolou. Jediný způsob, jak to zvládnout rychleji, je poslat danou věc jako odbavené zavazadlo. Letecké předpisy ale nedovolují poslat zavazadlo bez cestujícího, a tady přicházíte na řadu vy.
mt: Shipping companies are well paid for fast delivery of goods. Time is often a very important factor in business documents, goods or spare parts for urgent repair. On some routes, larger companies have their own aircraft, on other routes and smaller companies, however, there was a problem. If they sent things by air freight, it could take several days for things to go through unloading and customs control. The only way to handle it faster is to send the thing as checked baggage. Air regulations, however, do not allow sending baggage without a passenger, and here you come in.
ref: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair. On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem. If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs. The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.

src: Měli byste si pečlivě vybrat svou leteckou společnost Frequent Flyer, která je součástí aliance. Ačkoliv se vám zdá, že je intuitivní zvolit ty aerolinky, se kterými létáte nejčastěji, měli byste vzít v úvahu, že nabízené výhody jsou často odlišné a věrnostní body mohou být v případě jiných aerolinek patřících do stejné aliance výhodnější.
mt: You should carefully choose your Frequent Flyer airline which is part of an alliance. Although it seems intuitive to choose the airlines you fly most often, you should consider that the offered benefits are often different and loyalty points may be more advantageous in the case of other airlines belonging to the same alliance.
ref: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

src: Alkoholické nápoje konzumujte s mírou. Alkohol účinkuje na každého jinak a je důležité znát svou hranici. Mezi dlouhodobé zdravotní následky nadměrného pití patří poškození jater či dokonce slepota a následná smrt. Nebezpečí se zvyšuje při konzumaci alkoholu pocházejícího z ilegální výroby. Nelegální lihoviny mohou obsahovat různé nebezpečné příměsi včetně methanolu, který může i v malých dávkách způsobit slepotu nebo smrt.
mt: Drink responsibly. Alcohol affects everyone differently and it is important to know your limits. Long-term health consequences of excessive drinking include liver damage and even blindness and death. The risk increases when consuming alcohol produced illegally. Illicit liquors may contain various dangerous additives including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.
ref: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.

src: Alkoholické nápoje konzumujte s mírou. Alkohol účinkuje na každého jinak a je důležité znát svou hranici. Mezi dlouhodobé zdravotní následky nadměrného pití patří poškození jater či dokonce slepota a následná smrt. Nebezpečí se zvyšuje při konzumaci alkoholu pocházejícího z ilegální výroby. Nelegální lihoviny mohou obsahovat různé nebezpečné příměsi včetně methanolu, který může i v malých dávkách způsobit slepotu nebo smrt.
mt: Drink responsibly. Alcohol affects everyone differently and it is important to know your limits. Long-term health consequences of excessive drinking include liver damage and even blindness and death. The risk increases when consuming alcohol produced illegally. Illicit liquors may contain various dangerous additives including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.
ref: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.

src: Canal District (nizozemsky: Grachtengordel) je známá čtvrť ze 17. století obklopující amsterdamský Binnenstad. Celá čtvrť je označena jako Světové dědictví UNESCO pro svoji jedinečnou kulturní a historickou hodnotu a ceny místních nemovitostí jsou jedny z nejvyšších v zemi.
mt: Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is a famous 17th-century district surrounding Amsterdam's Binnenstad. The entire district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value and the prices of local real estate are among the highest in the country.
ref: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.

src: Phnom Krom, 12 km jihozápadně od města Siem Reap. Tento chrám byl vybudován na kopci koncem 9. století během vlády krále Jasovarmana. Díky ponuré atmosféře chrámu a výhledu na jezero Tonle Sap stojí výšlap na kopec za váš čas. Výlet na toto místo může být vhodně spojený s plavbou lodí po jezeře. Pro vstup do chrámu budete potřebovat Angkor Pass, na cestu k Tonlésap si tedy s sebou vzít nezapomeňte vzít cestovní pas .
mt: 12 km southwest of the city of Siem Reap. This temple was built at the end of the 9th century during the reign of King Yasovarman. Thanks to the gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view of the lake Tonle Sap, the climb to the top of the hill is worth your time. A trip to this place can be appropriately combined with a boat ride on the lake. To enter the temple you will need Angkor Pass, so do not forget to take your passport on the way to Tonlésap.
ref: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake. The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.

src: Antarktida je nejchladnějším místem na Zemi a obklopuje jižní pól. Turistické návštěvy jsou nákladné, vyžadují fyzickou zdatnost, mohou se uskutečnit pouze v létě (listopad - únor), a jsou omezeny především na Antarktický poloostrov, Ostrovy a Rossovo moře. Několik tisíc zaměstnanců zde v létě žije na zhruba čtyřech tuctech základen většinou v této oblasti; malý počet jich zůstává přes zimu. Vnitrozemí Antarktidy je pustá náhorní plošina, pokrytá 2–3 km silnou vrstvou ledu. Příležitostné speciální letecké zájezdy vedou do vnitrozemí za účelem horolezectví nebo dosažení pólu, který má velkou základnu.
mt: Antartica is the coldest place on Earth and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are expensive, require physical fitness, can only take place in the summer (November - February), and are limited primarily to the Antarctic Peninsula, the Islands and the Ross Sea. Several thousand people live there in the summer on about four dozen bases mostly in this area; a small number of them stay over the winter. The interior of Antarctica is a barren plateau, covered by a 2–3 km thick layer of ice. Occasional special air tours lead to the interior for mountaineering or to reach the pole, which has a large base.
ref: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice. Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.

src: Observatoře předmoderní doby jsou dnes většinou zastaralé a slouží jako muzea nebo místa pro vzdělání. Protože lehké znečištění v jejich vrcholu nebylo takovým problémem jako dnes, jsou obvykle umístěny ve městech nebo kampusech, snadněji dosažitelné než ty postavené v moderní době. Většina moderních výzkumných teleskopů jsou obrovská zařízení v odlehlých oblastech s příznivými atmosférickými podmínkami.
mt: 19th century observatories are now mostly obsolete and serve as museums or places of education. Because light pollution in their era was not such a problem as today, they are usually located in cities or campuses, more easily accessible than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are huge devices in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.
ref: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education. As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.

src: Je tu mnoho pláží vzhledem k tomu, že Auckland leží mezi dvěma přístavy. Ty nejoblíbenější pláže se nalézají ve třech oblastech. Pláže North Shore (v okrese North Harbour) se nacházejí v Tichém oceánu a táhnou se od Long Bay na severu až po Devonport na jihu. Jsou to téměř písčité pláže s možností bezpečného plavání a většina je stíněna stromy pohutukawa. Pláže Tamaki Drive jsou u přístavu Waitemata ve vyhledávaných čtvrtích Mission Bay a St. Heliers v centrálním Aucklandu. Jsou to někdy zalidněné rodinné pláže s velkým výběrem obchodů podél břehu. Plavání je bezpečné.
mt: There are many beaches due to Auckland being between two harbours. The most popular beaches are in three areas. North Shore (in the North Harbour region) beaches are in the Pacific Ocean and run from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are almost sandy beaches with safe swimming and most are shaded by pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are in the Waitemata Harbour in the popular suburbs of Mission Bay and St. Heliers in central Auckland. They are sometimes crowded family beaches with a large selection of shops along the shore. Swimming is safe.
ref: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.

src: Pamatujte prosím, že v podstatě navštěvujete místo masového pohřebiště a také místo, které má téměř nevyčíslitelný význam pro značnou část světové populace. Dosud žije mnoho mužů a žen, kteří přežili internaci na tomto místě, a ještě mnohem více těch, jejichž milovaní zde byli zavražděni nebo zemřeli smrtí vyčerpáním z nucených prací, židé či nežidé bez rozdílu. Na tomto místě se prosím chovejte s veškerou důstojností, vážností a úctou, které zasluhuje. Nevtipkujte o holokaustu nebo nacistech. Nehyzděte místo značkami ani vyškrabováním graffiti do struktur.
mt: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site and also a place that has almost incalculable significance for a large portion of the world's population. Many men and women still live who survived internment here, and even more whose loved ones were murdered or died of exhaustion from forced labor, Jews or non-Jews without distinction. Please conduct yourselves with all due dignity, seriousness, and respect that this place deserves. Do not discuss the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the site with graffiti or by scratching into structures.
ref: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike. Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.

src: Pomocné jazyky jsou umělé nebo sestavené jazyky vytvořené za účelem používání v komunikaci mezi lidmi, kteří by se jinak dorozumívali jen těžko. Je to něco jiného než lingua franca, což je přirozený jazyk, který se z různých důvodů stane v dané oblasti dominantním a používá se k dorozumění mezi mluvčími různých jazyků.
mt: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created for use in communication between people who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. It is something different than a lingua franca, which is a natural language that for various reasons becomes dominant in a given area and is used for communication between speakers of different languages.
ref: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.

src: Pokud se vydáte přes severní Baltské moře v zimě, zkontrolujte umístění kabiny, protože plavba skrz led způsobuje v exponovaných místech nesnesitelný hluk. Petrohradské okružní plavby obsahují čas ve městě. Na pasažéry okružních plaveb se nevztahují vízové požadavky (podívejte se na podmínky).
mt: If you travel through the Baltic Sea in winter, check the location of the cabin, as the passage through the ice causes unbearable noise in exposed areas. St. Petersburg's round-trip cruises include time in the city. Visa requirements do not apply to round-trip passengers (see conditions).
ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

src: Oficiálním jazykem Barcelony je katalánština a španělština. Zhruba polovina obyvatel upřednostňuje katalánštinu, podstatná většina jí rozumí a prakticky každý umí španělsky. Většina cedulí a nápisů je nicméně jen v katalánštině, protože ta je ze zákona zavedena jako první úřední jazyk. Španělština se však běžně používá ve veřejné dopravě a dalších zařízeních. Pravidelná hlášení v metru jsou pouze v katalánštině, avšak neplánované výpadky provozu ohlašuje automatický systém v mnoha různých jazycích – ve španělštině, angličtině, francouzštině, arabštině a japonštině.
mt: The official languages of Barcelona are Catalan and Spanish. Roughly half of the population prefers Catalan, a majority understands it, and almost everyone speaks Spanish. However, most signs and inscriptions are only in Catalan, as it is the language of the first official language. Spanish is used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the metro are only in Catalan, but unplanned service interruptions are announced by an automatic system in many different languages – in Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
ref: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.

src: V dnešních rozvinutých zemích bylo poskytování luxusního ubytování se snídaní pozvednuto na jakousi formu umění. Na špičce očividně B&B soutěží především ve dvou hlavních kategoriích: lůžkovinách a snídani. Proto také člověk může najít v nejlepších takových zařízeních velice luxusní ložní prádlo, možná i ručně šitou deku nebo starožitnou postel. Ke snídani se často podávají místní sezónní lahůdky nebo specialita hostitele. Prostředí může být stará historická budova s antickým nábytkem, udržovanými pozemky a bazénem.
mt: In today's developed countries, the provision of luxury accommodation with breakfast has been elevated to some kind of art form. At the top, B&Bs compete primarily in two main categories: bed linen and breakfast. So a person can find in the best of such establishments very luxurious bed linen, perhaps even a hand-sewn quilt or antique bed. Breakfast is often served local seasonal delicacies or the host's specialty. The environment can be an old historic building with antique furniture, well-kept grounds and a pool.
ref: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form. At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast. Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish. The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.

Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish. The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.

src: Čínské město Peking bude hostitelským městem zimních olympijských her v roce 2022, což z něj učiní první město, které hostilo letní i zimní olympijské hry. Peking bude hostovat slavnostní zahájení a zakončení a akce v uzavřených ledních halách. Další lyžařské akce budou probíhat v lyžařské oblasti Taizicheng v Čang-ťia-kchou, zhruba 220 km (140 mil) od Pekingu.
mt: Beijing will be the host city of the 2022 Winter Olympics, making it the first city to host both the Summer and Winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and events in indoor ice arenas. Other skiing events will be held in the ski area of Taizicheng in Changchun, about 220 km (140 mi) from Beijing.
ref: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.

src: Ptačí chřipka či odborněji influenza ptáků může infikovat jak ptáky, tak i savce. U lidí bylo hlášeno méně než tisíc případů, ale některé z nich skončily smrtí. Většina se týkala lidí, kteří pracují s drůbeží, existuje ale i určité riziko pro amatérské ornitology.
mt: Bird flu or more formally avian influenza can infect both birds and mammals. Less than a thousand cases have been reported in humans, but some have ended in death. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is some risk for amateur ornithologists.
ref: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.

src: Vikingové použili ruské vodní cesty, aby se dostali do Černého a Kaspického moře. Části těchto tras lze stále používat. Zkontrolujte možnou potřebu zvláštních povolení, která může být obtížné získat. Bělomořsko-baltský kanál propojuje Severní ledový oceán  s Baltským mořem přes Oněžské jezero, Ladožské jezero a Petrohrad, většinou přes řeky a jezera. Jezero Onega je také spojeno s Volhou, takže je stále možné připlout z Kaspického moře přes Rusko.
mt: The Vikings used Russian waterways to get to the Black and Caspian Seas. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check for any special permits that may be difficult to obtain. The White Sea-Baltic Canal connects the North Atlantic Ocean with the Baltic Sea through Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and St. Petersburg, mostly through rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is also connected to the Volga, so it is still possible to sail from the Caspian Sea through Russia.
ref: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get. The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.

src: Imigrační kontrolní bod bývá první zastávkou po vystoupení z letadla, lodi nebo jiného vozidla. V některých přeshraničních vlacích se kontroly provádějí za jízdy a při nástupu do těchto vlaků musíte mít platný průkaz totožnosti. V nočních lůžkových vlacích může průvodčí vybrat cestovní pasy, aby vám nic nenarušovalo spánek.
mt: The immigration checkpoint is often the first stop after disembarking from an airplane, boat, or other vehicle. In some cross-border trains, the checks are done while the train is moving and you must have a valid ID when boarding these trains. In overnight sleeper trains, the conductor may collect passports to avoid disturbing your sleep.
ref: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle. In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains. On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.

src: "Singapur je pro pobyt obecně extrémně bezpečná země. Také se tam velmi snadno orientujete a po příjezdu si můžete zakoupit téměř vše. ""Ale vzhledem k tomu, že se nachází v """"pravých tropech"""" jen několik stupňů severně od rovníku, budete se muset potýkat s horkem (vždy) a prudkým sluncem (při jasné obloze, méně často)."""
mt: "Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to live. Also, you can easily get around there after arrival and buy almost anything. "But, being located in the """"right tropics"""" just a few degrees north of the equator, you will have to deal with heat (always) and strong sun (on a clear day, less often)."
ref: "Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving. But being placed in the ""high tropics"" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely)."

src: Německé moučníky jsou docela dobré a v Bavorsku jsou bohaté a různorodé, velmi podobné jako u jejich jižních sousedů v Rakousku. Ovocné pečivo je běžné. Jablka se v pečivu používají po celý rok, během léta se potom objevují třešně a švestky. Mnoho německých pečených výrobků také obsahuje mandle a lískové a jiné ořechy. Oblíbené moučníky se často hodí zejména k šálku silné kávy. Pokud chcete ochutnat nějaké vydatné sladkosti, vyzkoušejte třeba moučníky, které jsou v závislosti na regionu zvané Berliner, Pfannkuchen nebo Krapfen.
mt: German pastries are quite good and in Bavaria they are rich and varied, very similar to their southern neighbors in Austria. Fruit pastry is common. Apples are used in pastry all year round, during the summer then appear cherries and plums. Many German baked goods also contain almonds and hazelnuts and other nuts. Popular pastries are often suitable especially with a cup of strong coffee. If you want to taste some substantial sweets, try pastries, which are depending on the region called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.
ref: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer. Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee. If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.

src: Pokud chcete poznat svět co nejlevněji, ať již z nezbytnosti, kvůli životnímu stylu nebo jako výzvu, existují způsoby, jak to provést. V podstatě existují dvě kategorie možností: buď během cestování pracujete nebo zkusíte co nejvíc omezit výdaje. Tento článek se zaměřuje na druhou skupinu. Pokud jste ochotni obětovat pohodlí, čas a předvídatelnost, abyste snížili náklady co nejblíže nule, podívejte se na úsporné cestování. Tato rada předpokládá, že cestující nekradou, nepáchají přestupky, neúčastní se černého trhu, nežebrají nebo jinak nezneužívají jiné lidi k vlastnímu prospěchu.
mt: If you want to know the world on the cheapest, whether out of necessity, for lifestyle or as a challenge, there are ways to do it. Basically there are two categories of options: either you work while traveling or you try to reduce expenses as close to zero as possible. This article focuses on the latter group. If you are willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to reduce costs as close to zero as possible, look at frugal travel. This advice assumes that travelers do not steal, commit crimes, engage in the black market, beg or otherwise abuse other people for their own benefit.
ref: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that. Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter. For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel. The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.

src: Úsek mezi Point Marion a Fairmontem skýtá na dálnici z Buffala do Pittsburghu nejnáročnější podmínky pro řízení, jelikož často prochází mezi izolovaným zalesněným terénem. Pokud nejste zvyklí na jízdu po venkovských cestách, buďte obezřetní: převládají strmé úhly, úzké pruhy a ostré zatáčky. Maximální povolená rychlost je tu výrazně nižší než v předcházejících a navazujících úsecích – obvykle 35–40 mil/h (56–64 km/h) – a její přísné dodržování je ještě důležitější. Zajímavé nicméně je, že služby mobilních telefonů zde fungují daleko lépe než v řadě úseků cesty, např. v Pensylvánské divočině.
mt: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont offers the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-to-Pittsburgh route, as it often passes through isolated wooded terrain. If you’re not used to driving on country roads, be cautious: there are steep inclines, narrow lanes, and sharp turns. The maximum speed limit is significantly lower than in the preceding and following sections – usually 35–40 mph (56–64 km/h) – and its strict adherence is even more important. Interestingly, however, mobile phone services work much better here than in many other sections of the route, such as in the Pennsylvania Wilds.
ref: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain. If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate. Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise. Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.

src: Canyoning je sport, při kterém se leze na dno kaňonu, který je buď vyschlý, nebo plný vody. Canyoning kombinuje prvky plavání, lezení a skákání, ale do začátku nevyžaduje příliš mnoho tréninku nebo fyzické kondice (v porovnání například s horolezectvím, potápěním nebo alpským lyžováním).
mt: Caving is a sport in which one descends into a canyon, which may be dry or full of water. Canyoning combines elements of swimming, climbing and jumping, but does not require much training or physical fitness (in comparison, for example, with mountaineering, scuba diving or alpine skiing).
ref: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water. Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).

src: Usednout do vlastního vozu a vydat se na dlouhou cestu po silnici je velmi lákavé vzhledem ke své jednoduchosti. S jízdou ve svém autě jste, na rozdíl od větších vozidel, nejspíše dobře seznámeni a znáte jeho limity. Postavení stanu na soukromém pozemku nebo v libovolně velkém městě může snadno přitáhnout nežádoucí pozornost. Stručně řečeno, automobil představuje skvělý způsob, jak se někam přesunout, ale sám o sobě ke „kempování“ nestačí. Autokemping je možný v případě, že vlastníte minivan, SUV, sedan nebo kombi se sklopitelnými sedačkami.
mt: It is very tempting to use your own car and drive a long way on the road. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably well acquainted with your car and know its limits. Placing a tent on private property or in any large city can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, a car is a great way to get somewhere, but by itself it is not enough for "camping". Car camping is possible if you own a minivan, SUV, sedan or station wagon with fold-down seats.
ref: "Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to ""camp"". Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down."

src: Moderní město Casablanca bylo založeno berberskými rybáři v 10. století př. n. l. a bylo využíváno Féničany, Římany a Merenidy jako strategický přístav jménem Anfa. Portugalci město zničili a přestavěli pod názvem Casa Branca, a po zemětřesení v roce 1755 ho opustili. Marocký sultán město přestavěl na Daru l-Badya a španělští obchodníci, kteří si tam založili obchodní základny, mu dali jméno Casablanca. Casablanca je jedním z nejméně zajímavých míst k nakupování v celém Maroku. Kolem staré Mediny je snadné najít místa, kde se prodává tradiční marocké zboží, jako je tažín, keramika, kožené zboží, vodní dýmky a široké spektrum cetek, ale to vše je pro turisty.
mt: Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BC and was used by Phoenicians, Romans and Merenids as a strategic port named Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed the city and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, and after the 1755 earthquake they abandoned it. The Moroccan Sultan rebuilt it as Dar al-Baida and Spanish merchants, who established trading posts there, gave it the name Casablanca. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in the whole of Morocco. Around the old Medina it is easy to find places where traditional Moroccan goods are sold, such as tajine, ceramics, leather goods, water pipes and a wide range of souvenirs, but all this is for tourists.
ref: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco. Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.

src: Moderní město Casablanca bylo založeno berberskými rybáři v 10. století př. n. l. a bylo využíváno Féničany, Římany a Merenidy jako strategický přístav jménem Anfa. Portugalci město zničili a přestavěli pod názvem Casa Branca, a po zemětřesení v roce 1755 ho opustili. Marocký sultán město přestavěl na Daru l-Badya a španělští obchodníci, kteří si tam založili obchodní základny, mu dali jméno Casablanca. Casablanca je jedním z nejméně zajímavých míst k nakupování v celém Maroku. Kolem staré Mediny je snadné najít místa, kde se prodává tradiční marocké zboží, jako je tažín, keramika, kožené zboží, vodní dýmky a široké spektrum cetek, ale to vše je pro turisty.
mt: Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BC and was used by Phoenicians, Romans and Merenids as a strategic port named Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed the city and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, and after the 1755 earthquake they abandoned it. The Moroccan Sultan rebuilt it as Dar al-Baida and Spanish merchants, who established trading posts there, gave it the name Casablanca. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in the whole of Morocco. Around the old Medina it is easy to find places where traditional Moroccan goods are sold, such as tajine, ceramics, leather goods, water pipes and a wide range of souvenirs, but all this is for tourists.
ref: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco. Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.

src: Na severu a v dobrém dosahu se nachází romantické a fascinující město Sintra, které se proslavilo mezi cizinci díky své kráse popisované lordem Byronem. Autobus sítě Scotturb číslo 403 jezdí do Sintry a zastavuje na Cabo da Roca. Na severu také navštivte Svatyni Panny Marie ve Fatimě (Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima), která je celosvětově známým místem zjevování Panny Marie.
mt: To the north and in good reach is the romantic and fascinating city of Sintra, which became famous among foreigners for its beauty described by Lord Byron. Bus network Scotturb number 403 goes to Sintra and stops at Cabo da Roca. To the north also visit the Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima, which is a worldwide known place of apparitions of the Virgin Mary.
ref: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron. Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca. Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.

src: Náhorní Karabach, etnicky arménský region Ázerbájdžánu, vedl v roce 1994 válku proti Ázerbájdžáncům. S podporou Arménie byla založena nová republika. Žádný oficiální národ – dokonce ani Arménie – ji však neuznává. Diplomatické spory o oblast nadále maří vztahy mezi Arménií a Ázerbajdžánem.
mt: Nagorno-Karabakh, an ethnically Armenian region of Azerbaijan, led a war against Azerbaijanis in 1994. With the support of Armenia, a new republic was founded. No official nation – not even Armenia – recognizes it. Diplomatic disputes over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
ref: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris. With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it. Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.

No official nation – not even Armenia – recognizes it. Diplomatic disputes over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
ref: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris. With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it. Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.

src: Jednu ze silných stránek města Charlotte v Severní Karolíně představuje skutečnost, že nabízí velmi pestré a kvalitní možnosti zábavy pro celou rodinu. Obyvatelé z jiných oblastí často uvádějí jako hlavní důvod stěhování přívětivost pro rodiny, zatímco návštěvníci město oceňují díky skvělému času strávenému s dětmi. V posledních 20 letech v Uptown Charlotte exponenciálně vzrostl počet možností vstřícných k dětem. Rodiny v Charlotte obvykle taxi nepoužívají, ale za určitých okolností by se jízda taxíkem mohla hodit. Za více než 2 pasažéry je nutné zaplatit příplatek, takže tato možnost může být dražší, než je nezbytné.
mt: One of the strong points of the city of Charlotte in North Carolina is the fact that it offers very diverse and high-quality entertainment options for the whole family. Residents from other areas often cite the friendliness for families as the main reason for moving, while visitors appreciate the time spent with children. In the last 20 years in Uptown Charlotte the number of family-friendly options has grown exponentially. Families in Charlotte usually do not use taxis, but under certain circumstances a taxi ride might be useful. For more than 2 passengers, a surcharge is required, so this option may be more expensive than necessary.
ref: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families. Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around. In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially. Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances. There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.

src: Než v 16. století přišli Španělé, bylo severní Chile pod nadvládou Inků, zatímco původní Araukáni (Mapučové) obývali střední a jižní část Chile. Mapučové byli také jednou z posledních nezávislých domorodých skupin v Americe, která nebyla plně začleněna pod španělskou nadvládu až do vyhlášení chilské nezávislosti. Ačkoli Chile vyhlásilo nezávislost v roce 1810 (uprostřed napoleonských válek, které na pár let zanechaly Španělsko bez fungující ústřední vlády), rozhodného vítězství nad Španělskem bylo dosaženo až roku 1818.
mt: Before the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule, while the original Araucanians (Mapuches) inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuches were also one of the last independent indigenous groups in the Americas to be fully incorporated under Spanish rule until the declaration of Chilean independence. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (in the midst of the Napoleonic Wars, which left Spain without a functioning central government for a few years), decisive victory over Spain was not achieved until 1818.
ref: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.

src: Cinque Terre, což znamená Pět Zemí, se skládá z pěti malých pobřežních vesnic Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza a Monterosso, které se nacházejí v italské provincii Ligurie. Nachází se na seznamu světového dědictví UNESCO. Lidé v průběhu staletí pečlivě budovali terasy na strmém kamenitém svahu, který se zvedá k útesům s výhledem na moře. Součástí jeho kouzla je jen malý viditelný komerční rozvoj. Vesnice spojují cesty, vlaky a lodě a zvenčí se k nim auta nedostanou.
mt: Cinque Terre, meaning Five Lands, is made up of five small coastal villages Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso, located in the Italian province of Liguria. It is on the UNESCO World Heritage list. People over the centuries carefully built terraces on the steep rocky slope that rises to the cliffs with a view of the sea. Part of its charm is the small visible commercial development. The villages are connected by paths, trains and boats and cars can't get to them from outside.
ref: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria. They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea. Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.
